id=3D\"leftcol\">=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A  =\r\n                  In today's chaotic global business environment, C-suite e=\r\nxecutives face external challenges ranging from uncertain economic conditio=\r\nns to political unrest to freak natural disasters.  Any of these factors in=\r\n and of themselves can derail a seemingly bulletproof plan.   But when they=\r\n are combined with competing internal agendas and resource shortages, stayi=\r\nng the strategic course is more daunting than ever before.  =0D=0A         =\r\n       </p>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <div id=3D\"rightcol\">=\r\n=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    It requires that each an=\r\nd every member of an organization understands the mission, is clear on thei=\r\nr role in achieving it, and feels empowered to do what it takes to win.  It=\r\n requires exceptional  business execution.<br /><br />McKinney Rogers appli=\r\nes military philosophy and real-world experience to equip business teams wi=\r\nth the tools and capability to deliver high-performance results regardless =\r\nof the obstacles they face.=0D=0A                </p>=0D=0A            </di=\r\nv>=0D=0A        </div>=0D=0A    </div>=0D=0A    <div id=3D\"subcontenta\" cla=\r\nss=3D\"clearfix\">=0D=0A        <div class=3D\"dottedline\">=0D=0A        </div=\r\n>=0D=0A        <div class=3D\"col1 clearfix\">=0D=0A            <h2>=0D=0A   =\r\n                     Natural disasters are the challenge.</p>=0D=\r\n=0A                    <p>=0D=0A                        <a id=3D\"ctl00_Main=\r\nContent_hlClick_here_to_find_the_solution\" Countries like Poland and Estonia h=\r\nave established their international credentials by close involvement; other=\r\ns, like The Netherlands and Denmark, have burnished theirs. But it is indiv=\r\niduals and not countries that concern this article. As chairman of an inter=\r\nnational consultancy, I draw on two traditions: the military and business, =\r\nand I am not alone.=0D=0A                        </p>=0D=0A                =\r\n id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_img=\r\nMedia3\" title=3D\"Ultimate Teamwork\" src=3D\"Images/Articles/Ultimate%20Teamw=\r\nork.jpg\" alt=3D\"Ultimate Teamwork\" border=3D\"0\" /><br />=0D=0A             =\r\n       <div class=3D\"newsfeed-content\">=0D=0A                        <p>=0D=\r\n=0A                            Generations of executives have attempted to =\r\nadapt the mindset of the battlefield to the business world, from developing=\r\n a strategy to defeat corporate rivals to building camaraderie in an inhosp=\r\nitable environment.<br /> <br />Taking its cue from Britain=E2=80=99s vaunt=\r\ned Royal Marines, McKinney Rogers claims to have taken the approach a cruci=\r\nal step forward and unlocked the secret to delivering practical results thr=\r\nough its self-styled Mission Leadership methodology.=0D=0A                 =\r\n       </p>=0D=0A                    </div>=0D=0A                    <a id=\r\n=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlMedia3PDF\" class=3D\"readmore\" onclick=3D\"javascript=\r\n:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/News/Ultimate_Teamwork_Read_More_link/Out=\r\nlink/To_Ultimate_Teamwork_article_page&#39;);\" href=3D\"Documents/Articles/U=\r\nltimate%20Teamwork.pdf\" target=3D\"_blank\">Read more</a>=0D=0A              =\r\n      <br />=0D=0A                    <br />=0D=0A                    <div =\r\nclass=3D\"dottedline\">=0D=0A                    </div>=0D=0A                =\r\n</div>=0D=0A                <div class=3D\"newsfeed-post\">=0D=0A            =\r\n        <span class=3D\"newsfeed-title\">=0D=0A                        Best L=\r\neadership Teacher of All Time?=0D=0A                    </span>=0D=0A      =\r\n              <br />=0D=0A                    <span class=3D\"newsfeed-date\"=\r\n>=0D=0A                        Sonshi.com- 2010-07=0D=0A                   =\r\n </span>=0D=0A                    <br />=0D=0A                    <img id=\r\n=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imgMedia4\" title=3D\"Best Leadership Teacher of All Ti=\r\nme?\" src=3D\"Images/Articles/Best%20Leadership%20Teacher%20of%20All%20Time.j=\r\npg\" alt=3D\"Best Leadership Teacher of All Time?\" border=3D\"0\" /><br />=0D=\r\n=0A                    <div class=3D\"newsfeed-content\">=0D=0A              =\r\n          <p>=0D=0A                            Thirty years ago, as a junio=\r\nr military officer, I picked up a copy of Sun Tzu's The Art of War. I was a=\r\n young man then, and I realized that to succeed I would need to develop my =\r\nintellect, to have a proper, fully rounded education. Or at least I'd need =\r\nsomething more complex than banging out a ton of smoke and then going strai=\r\nght up the middle, as we used to say.<br /> <br />Of course a book on milit=\r\nary strategy would be useful to a military man, but how useful can it be to=\r\n a businessman? What can a 2,500-year-old text, heavy on the descriptions o=\r\nf chariots and mercenaries and cloaked in Confucian mysticism, tell us abou=\r\nt the modern business environment?=0D=0A                        </p>=0D=0A =\r\n                   </div>=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainConte=\r\nnt_hlMedia4PDF\" class=3D\"readmore\" href=3D\"Documents/A=\r\nrticles/Best%20Leadership%20Teacher%20of%20All%20Time.pdf\" target=3D\"_blank=\r\n\">Read more</a>=0D=0A                    <br />=0D=0A                    <b=\r\nr />=0D=0A Any of =\r\nthese factors in and of themselves can derail a seemingly bulletproof plan.=\r\n   But when they are combined with competing internal agendas and resource =\r\nshortages, staying the strategic course is more daunting than ever before. =\r\n =0D=0A                </p>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <div i=\r\nd=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    It requir=\r\nes that each and every member of an organization understands the mission, i=\r\ns clear on their role in achieving it, and feels empowered to do what it ta=\r\nkes to win. A time of unstable economies, an increasingly com=\r\npetitive marketplace, and political unrest. These are the facts of business=\r\n life. But they are not excuses for failure.=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<p>=0D=0A                   We are =\r\nBusiness Execution professionals and will equip your organization to delive=\r\nr business critical results regardless of the uncertainties and obstacles t=\r\nhat you face.=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t<table id=3D\"c1\"></table>=\r\n=0D=0A \t<div id=3D\"main-content-noborder\" class=3D\"clearfix\">=0D=0A    \t\t\t\t=\r\n<div id=3D\"tab-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<!-- the tabs -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<ul class=3D\"ta=\r\nbs\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c1\" >=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"hlTab1=\r\n\" class=3D\"w1\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pauseVideo();pageTracker._trackPagevie=\r\nw(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Our_Purpose_link/To_Our_Purpose_page&#39;);\">Tab 1</a>=\r\n=0D=0A                        </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c2\" >=0D=0A    =\r\n                <a id=3D\"hlTab2\" class=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTra=\r\ncker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Our_Philosophy_link/To_Our_Philosophy_=\r\npage&#39;);\">Tab 2</a>=0D=0A                        </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<li cl=\r\nass=3D\"c3\" >=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"hlTab3\" class=3D\"w3\" onclick=\r\n=3D\"javascript:pauseVideo();pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Our=\r\n_Heritage_link/To_Our_Heritage_page&#39;);\">Tab 3</a>=0D=0A                =\r\n        </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<!-- tab \"panes\" -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div=\r\n class=3D\"panes\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A        <strong>Inspiring people to=\r\n achieve the extraordinary.</strong><br /><br />Our Purpose alongside our V=\r\nalues comprise the core of our fabric- our DNA, our ethos. We relentlessly =\r\nchallenge ourselves, each other and our clients to push beyond what they be=\r\nlieve to be currently possible. Beyond the incremental. Our passion, energy=\r\n and results inspire a belief in hearts and minds that the extraordinary is=\r\n achievable.<br />=0D=0A   =0D=0A                        </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t=\r\n<div>=0D=0A       McKinney Rogers=E2=80=99 Mission Leadership philosophy is=\r\n based on a proven set of military disciplines and tools called Mission Com=\r\nmand.<br /><br />This battle-tested platform, which dates back to the Napol=\r\neonic era, serves as the foundation of operational planning and training fo=\r\nr some of the world=E2=80=99s most elite special forces, including the Brit=\r\nish Royal Marines.<br /><br />We apply the philosophy of Mission Leadership=\r\n to drive superior business performance. Mission Leadership is a truly holi=\r\nstic approach to business execution and starts with understanding the aspir=\r\national vision for the organization. Once an organization has clarity on =\r\n=E2=80=9Cwhere it is going,=E2=80=9D each individual must understand =E2=80=\r\n=9Cwhat is my role in achieving it?=E2=80=9D This clarity drives alignment,=\r\n instills a sense of personal accountability, and promotes the independent =\r\nthought and agility necessary to deliver mission-critical results despite o=\r\nbstacles faced. It requires outstanding leadership and high performance tea=\r\nmwork to be successful.<br /><br />By assembling elite operators with both =\r\nmilitary and senior corporate experience, we=E2=80=99ve achieved a masterfu=\r\nl balance of applied military planning and business leadership expertise. T=\r\nhese come together to drive business execution solutions that have consiste=\r\nntly proven their value to our clients =E2=80=94 including world-class comp=\r\nanies such as Bacardi, Pfizer, Grohe and Wal-Mart.<br /><br />Born of <a hr=\r\nef=3D'#' onclick=3D\"$('#hlTab3').trigger('click');return false;\">our proud =\r\nmilitary heritage</a>, McKinney Rogers=E2=80=99 Mission Leadership is a tru=\r\nly holistic approach to Business Execution.=0D=0A       =0D=0A             =\r\n              <table class=3D\"tabtable\" border=3D\"0\" cellpadding=3D\"0\" cell=\r\nspacing=3D\"0\">=0D=0A         =0D=0A       =\r\n                             </td>=0D=0A                                </t=\r\nr>=0D=0A                            </table>=0D=0A                         =\r\n               =0D=0A                        </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A =\r\n       Our founder and chairman are both veterans of the British Royal Mari=\r\nnes. They are the leaders who have transferred the tenets of Mission Comman=\r\nd to McKinney Rogers=E2=80=99 <a href=3D'What_We_Do.aspx'>Mission Leadershi=\r\np</a> approach to Business Execution.<br /><br />When our founder, Damian M=\r\ncKinney, entered the private sector at the completion of his 18-year servic=\r\ne, he discovered that the Royal Marines=E2=80=99 Mission Command approach t=\r\no talent identification and development, process design, project planning a=\r\nnd execution are directly transferable to the business world. From this ins=\r\night, McKinney Rogers was born.<br /><br />Our chairman, Sir Robert Fry KBC=\r\n, CBE, was Commandant General in the Royal Marines and served as Deputy Com=\r\nmanding General of Coalition Forces in the Iraq War. Before joining McKinne=\r\ny Rogers in 2007, Sir Robert was a Vice President of Hewlett Packard and he=\r\n remains an advisor to HP and a number of other companies in the defense an=\r\nd banking sectors. He is a member of the Royal United Services Institute ex=\r\necutive council and a trustee of Help for Heroes.=0D=0A                    =\r\n    =0D=0A                        </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=\r\n=0D=0A=0D=0A=0D=0A  =0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"sidebar-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div clas=\r\ns=3D\"sidebar\">=0D=0A\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"sidebar-head\">OUR LEADERSHIP TEAM</h3>=\r\n=0D=0A            <div class=3D\"sidebarintro\">Meet our leadership team:</di=\r\nv>=0D=0A=0D=0A\t\t\t<ul class=3D\"linklist1\" >=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<li><a id=3D\"hlBIO01\" t=\r\nitle=3D\"Damian McKinney\" rel=3D\"biorel\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pauseVideo();=\r\npageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Damian_McKinney_link/To_Damian_=\r\nMcKinney_lightbox&#39;);\" href=3D\"#b1\">Damian McKinney =C2=BB</a>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t=\r\n\tChief Executive & Founder\t=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<li><a id=3D\"hlBIO02\" t=\r\nitle=3D\"Sir Robert Fry\" rel=3D\"biorel\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pauseVideo();p=\r\nageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Sir_Robert_Fry_link/To_Sir_Rober=\r\nt_Fry_lightbox&#39;);\" href=3D\"#b2\">Sir Robert Fry =C2=BB</a>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t    =\r\nExecutive Chairman\t=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</li>=0D=0A                 <li><a id=3D\"hlBIO=\r\n11\" title=3D\"John Esposito\" rel=3D\"biorel\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pauseVideo=\r\n();pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Sir_Robert_Fry_link/To_John_=\r\nEsposito_lightbox&#39;);\" href=3D\"#b11\">John Esposito =C2=BB</a>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t =\r\n    Board Director\t=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</li>=0D=0A                <li><a id=3D\"hlBIO0=\r\n8\" title=3D\"H.            =\r\n        Damian McKinney=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<sp=\r\nan class=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A                        Chief Executive & Foun=\r\nder=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A                        <p>Af=\r\nter a fast-track career with the UK Royal Marines where he served for 18 ye=\r\nars as an operations commando, Damian McKinney entered the private sector a=\r\nnd discovered that the Royal Marines=E2=80=99 Mission Command approach to t=\r\nalent management, business process redesign, and project planning and execu=\r\ntion was directly relatable and transferable to the business world. </p><p>=\r\n&nbsp</p><p>In 1999, he founded the company around his love of =E2=80=9Crea=\r\nl operational challenges,=E2=80=9D particularly under severe pressure and f=\r\nocusing on results. And over the past decade, he has built a global organiz=\r\nation with offices on every subcontinent, and dedicated to delivering tangi=\r\nble and sustainable results for organizations ranging from Walmart to Diage=\r\no to Pfizer to Thomson Reuters.</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A =\r\n           </div>=0D=0A        </div>=0D=0A        <div id=3D\"b2\" class=3D\"=\r\npopup-wrap\" rel=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=0A   =\r\n             <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO02Prev\" class=3D\"prev\" oncli=\r\nck=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Previ=\r\nous_link/To_Previous_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREVIOUS</a>=\r\n=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO02Next\" class=3D\"ne=\r\nxt\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Light=\r\nbox_Next_link/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEXT =C2=BB</a>=0D=\r\n=0A\t        </div>=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div cl=\r\nass=3D\"bio\">=0D=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageLBB=\r\nIO02\" title=3D\"Sir Robert Fry\" src=3D\"Images/bio/2.%20Sir%20Rob.jpg\" alt=3D=\r\n\"Sir Robert Fry\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio-detail\">=0D=0A=\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=0A                        Sir Robert Fry=\r\n=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-title\">=\r\n=0D=0A                        Executive Chairman=0D=0A                     =\r\n   </span>=0D=0A                        <p>After having advised McKinney Ro=\r\ngers in a non-executive role since 2007, Sir Robert Fry was appointed Execu=\r\ntive Chairman of the firm in 2010. </p><p>&nbsp</p><p>Before joining McKinn=\r\ney Rogers, Sir Robert served as EMEA Regional Vice President for Defense & =\r\nSecurity at Hewlett-Packard. Prior to that, he had a full military career, =\r\nculminating in an operational tour as Deputy Commanding General of the coal=\r\nition forces in Iraq. He continues his contribution to the military as Colo=\r\nnel of the Special Reconnaissance Regiment. He is also a member of the Roya=\r\nl United Services Institute Executive Council, as well as a Freeman of the =\r\nCity of London. </p>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A            </di=\r\nv>=0D=0A        </div>=0D=0A       <div id=3D\"b11\" class=3D\"popup-wrap\" rel=\r\n=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=0A                <a=\r\n id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO11Prev\" class=3D\"prev\" onclick=3D\"javascrip=\r\nt:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Previous_link/To_Pre=\r\nvious_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREVIOUS</a>=0D=0A          =\r\n           <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO11Next\" class=3D\"next\" onclick=\r\n=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Next_li=\r\nnk/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEXT =C2=BB</a>=0D=0A\t        =\r\n</div>=0D=0A=0D=0A             <div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div clas=\r\ns=3D\"bio\">=0D=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageLBBIO=\r\n11\" title=3D\"John Esposito\" src=3D\"Images/bio/11.%20John%20Esposito.jpg\" al=\r\nt=3D\"John Esposito\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio-detail\">=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=0A                        John Esposi=\r\nto=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-title=\r\n\">=0D=0A                        Board Director=0D=0A                       =\r\n </span>=0D=0A                        <p>John Esposito joined McKinney Roge=\r\nrs in November 2011. Previously he was President and CEO of Bacardi U.S.A. =\r\nand Bacardi North America, with responsibility for the United States, Canad=\r\na and Puerto Rico.</p><p>&nbsp</p>=0D=0A<p>Under his leadership, Bacardi es=\r\ntablished a vision to become the number one value creating premium spirits =\r\ncompany in the industry with a portfolio featuring some of the world=E2=80=\r\n=99s favorite products including Bacardi, Grey Goose, Bombay Sapphire and D=\r\newar=E2=80=99s Scotch whisky,  Martini and Rossi vermouth in addition to ne=\r\nw and emerging brands such Corzo tequila and 42Below vodka among others. </=\r\np><p>&nbsp</p>=0D=0A<p>Prior to joining Bacardi, he was President and CEO o=\r\nf Moet Hennessy USA and has also held a number of other key positions inclu=\r\nding President and CEO of Shieffelin & Somerset, President of Premier Bever=\r\nage Co. of Florida, Vice President and Director of Sales for W.A. Taylor & =\r\nCo., and Vice President, National Sales Manager, Seagram Wine Co. </p><p>&n=\r\nbsp</p>=0D=0A<p>Mr. Esposito earned a bachelor=E2=80=99s degree in business=\r\n from New York=E2=80=99s Manhattan College and is a graduate of the Harvard=\r\n University Advanced Management Program for Senior Managers.  Always active=\r\n in charity fundraising throughout his career, he has been honored as =E2=\r\n=80=9CMan of the Year=E2=80=9D by The Boy Scouts of America and the United =\r\nJewish Appeal, and the industry=E2=80=99s American Cancer Society=E2=80=99s=\r\n Dr. Louis Berger Memorial Award.  In 2002 he received a Doctor of Laws Deg=\r\nree from Medgar Evers College for his work in supporting education. He is c=\r\nurrently a board member of the Wolfsonian Museum=E2=80=94Florida Internatio=\r\nnal University and the Thurgood Marshall Scholarship Foundation. </p><p>&nb=\r\nsp</p>=0D=0A                    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A            </d=\r\niv>        =0D=0A        </div>=0D=0A        <div id=3D\"b8\" class=3D\"popup-=\r\nwrap\" rel=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=0A         =\r\n       <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO08Prev\" class=3D\"prev\" onclick=3D\"=\r\njavascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Previous_li=\r\nnk/To_Previous_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREVIOUS</a>=0D=0A =\r\n               <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO08Next\" class=3D\"next\" onc=\r\nlick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Nex=\r\nt_link/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEXT =C2=BB</a>=0D=0A\t    =\r\n    </div>=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"b=\r\nio\">=0D=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageLBBIO08\" ti=\r\ntle=3D\"H. Prior to that, he was =\r\nVP Asia Pacific of Schick Wilkinson Sword, where he led the company through=\r\n M&As under Warner-Lambert, Pfizer and Energizer to maintain its position a=\r\ns #1 in the market. Also, as the company=E2=80=99s first Global Business Di=\r\nrector, he created its first global brand identity, package and new product=\r\n.</p>=0D=0A                    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A            </di=\r\nv>=0D=0A        </div>=0D=0A          <div id=3D\"b10\" class=3D\"popup-wrap\" =\r\nrel=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=0A               =\r\n <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO10Prev\" class=3D\"prev\" onclick=3D\"javasc=\r\nript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Previous_link/To_=\r\nPrevious_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREVIOUS</a>=0D=0A       =\r\n             <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO10Next\" class=3D\"next\" oncli=\r\nck=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Next_=\r\nlink/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEXT =C2=BB</a> =0D=0A\t     =\r\n   </div>=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bi=\r\no\">=0D=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageLBBIO10\" tit=\r\nle=3D\"Jed Stone\" src=3D\"Images/bio/10.%20Jed%20Stone.jpg\" alt=3D\"Jed Stone\"=\r\n border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio-detail\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span clas=\r\ns=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=0A                        Jed Stone=0D=0A               =\r\n         </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A               =\r\n         Partner, Europe/Middle East=0D=0A                        </span>=\r\n=0D=0A                        <p>During his time in the Royal Marines, Jed =\r\nspent six years at Joint Services Mountaineering centers as well as three y=\r\nears at the Royal Naval School of Leadership and Management Training. He jo=\r\nined the company in 2001 as a lead coach heading a team of 10-12 individual=\r\ns facilitating global conferences and High Performance Team workshops. </p>=\r\n<p>&nbsp</p><p>He is now a Partner covering the Alcohol/Beverage Industry, =\r\nworking closely with a number of clients, combining strategic alignment wit=\r\nh inspirational leadership and high performance behaviors. Jed has a real p=\r\nassion for enabling others to achieve higher levels of performance.</p><p>&=\r\nnbsp</p><p>During his 25 years serving in the Royal Marine Commandos Jed wa=\r\ns lucky enough to be a member of a team that broke a world record, competed=\r\n internationally at sport and was able to undertake challenging mountaineer=\r\ning expeditions. This instilled a determination to work with people who wan=\r\nted to be 'high performers'. His family plays the most important part in hi=\r\ns life but he also enjoys all outdoor pursuits as well as watching rugby an=\r\nd football.</p>=0D=0A                    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A      =\r\n      </div>           =0D=0A        </div>=0D=0A         <div id=3D\"b9\" cl=\r\nass=3D\"popup-wrap\" rel=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"overdrap\">=\r\n=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO09Prev\" class=3D\"pr=\r\nev\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Light=\r\nbox_Previous_link/To_Previous_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREV=\r\nIOUS</a>=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO09Next\" cla=\r\nss=3D\"next\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_A=\r\nre/Lightbox_Next_link/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEXT =C2=BB=\r\n</a>=0D=0A\t        </div>=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t=\r\n<div class=3D\"bio\">=0D=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_i=\r\nmageLBBIO09\" title=3D\"Chris Stephenson\" src=3D\"Images/bio/9.%20Chris%20Step=\r\nhenson.jpg\" alt=3D\"Chris Stephenson\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\r\n=3D\"bio-detail\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=0A                =\r\n        Chris Stephenson=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<s=\r\npan class=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A                        Partner, Africa=0D=0A=\r\n                        </span>=0D=0A                        <p>McKinney Ro=\r\ngers=E2=80=99 partner in Africa, Chris Stephenson specializes in developing=\r\n new markets, building organizations and cultivating talent. He has a deep =\r\npassion for and understanding of the continent and its unlimited desire for=\r\n growth =E2=80=94 commercially, collectively and individually.</p><p>&nbsp<=\r\n/p><p>Born and raised in East Africa, Chris moved to the UK to attend Cambr=\r\nidge University, then enlisted in the British Army. Following his military =\r\ncareer, he became a corporate star. His most recent stint was Commercial Di=\r\nrector of Diageo=E2=80=99s West African business, where he led a sales forc=\r\ne of 350 people that delivered =C2=A340m turnover annually, and executed a =\r\nstrategic change program that delivered =C2=A32m annual savings.</p>=0D=0A =\r\n                   </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A    =\r\n    </div>=0D=0A        <div id=3D\"b4\" class=3D\"popup-wrap\" rel=3D\"biorel\">=\r\n=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00=\r\n_MainContent_hlLBBIO04Prev\" class=3D\"prev\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracke=\r\nr._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Previous_link/To_Previous_lightb=\r\nox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREVIOUS</a>=0D=0A                <a id=\r\n=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO04Next\" class=3D\"next\" onclick=3D\"javascript:p=\r\nageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Next_link/To_Next_light=\r\nbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEXT =C2=BB</a>=0D=0A\t        </div>=0D=0A\t   =\r\n     <div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio\">=0D=0A          =\r\n          <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageLBBIO04\" title=3D\"Richard Watts=\r\n\" src=3D\"Images/bio/4.%20Richard%20Watts.jpg\" alt=3D\"Richard Watts\" border=\r\n=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio-detail\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bi=\r\no-name\">=0D=0A                        Richard Watts=0D=0A                  =\r\n      </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A                  =\r\n      Partner and Chief of Staff=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A=\r\n                        <p>As global Chief of Staff, Richard Watts leads al=\r\nl functions that support the front line of our business. He joined McKinney=\r\n Rogers in 2006, and previously served as Regional Partner for Europe and t=\r\nhe Middle East. He is highly experienced at strategic planning, ensuring th=\r\nat client strategy is operationalized into an executable plan.</p><p>&nbsp<=\r\n/p><p>Richard came to us with 25 years of experience as an officer in the R=\r\noyal Marines, where he led successful missions in extreme conditions. He st=\r\nudied at Ashridge and Manchester Business Schools. He is a regular contribu=\r\ntor to business journals on leadership and has appeared on BBC Business TV.=\r\n </p>=0D=0A                    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A                Russ Thornton=0D=0A      =\r\n                  </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A      =\r\n                  Chief Technology Officer=0D=0A                        </s=\r\npan>=0D=0A                        <p>With over 20 years=E2=80=99 experience=\r\n delivering global, mission-critical IT solutions, Chief Technology Officer=\r\n Russ Thornton has a passion for quickly translating business needs into te=\r\nchnology solutions that drive results. </p><p>&nbsp</p><p>Prior to McKinney=\r\n Rogers, Russ ran a San Francisco-based consultancy providing software and =\r\ninfrastructure solutions to the Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT) market,=\r\n and also co-founded m35, a UK-based financial software company. He has ser=\r\nved as Senior Technical Consultant for Reuters on large dealing-room system=\r\ns integration and development projects; Director of Software Development fo=\r\nr Dai-Ichi Kangyo Bank in London; and Director of Consulting for Corillian =\r\nInternational, creating retail banking websites.</p>=0D=0A                 =\r\n   </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A        </div>=0D=0A=\r\n        <div id=3D\"b5\" class=3D\"popup-wrap\" rel=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t        <=\r\ndiv class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlL=\r\nBBIO05Prev\" class=3D\"prev\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview=\r\n(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Previous_link/To_Previous_lightbox_frame&#39;);\"=\r\n href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREVIOUS</a>=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainCon=\r\ntent_hlLBBIO05Next\" class=3D\"next\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._track=\r\nPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Next_link/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\"=\r\n href=3D\"#\">NEXT =C2=BB</a>=0D=0A\t        </div>=0D=0A\t        <div class=\r\n=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio\">=0D=0A                    <img =\r\nid=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageLBBIO05\" title=3D\"Steven Lindsay\" src=3D\"Image=\r\ns/bio/5.%20Steven%20Lindsay.jpg\" alt=3D\"Steven Lindsay\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio-detail\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=\r\n=0A                        Steven Lindsay=0D=0A                        </sp=\r\nan>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A                        Part=\r\nner, Finance=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A                    =\r\n    <p>Steven joined McKinney Rogers in 2008, he has over 10 years=E2=80=99=\r\n experience in all aspects of accounting and business management. Prior to =\r\nMcKinney Rogers, Steven has held leadership positions in the Manufacturing,=\r\n IT & Travel sectors. He has been involved in numerous Mergers and Acquisit=\r\nions throughout his career and has a proven track record of rapidly transfo=\r\nrming finance functions effectiveness.</p>=0D=0A                    </div>=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A        </div>      =0D=0A   =\r\n  =0D=0A        <div id=3D\"b6\" class=3D\"popup-wrap\" rel=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t =\r\n       <div class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainCon=\r\ntent_hlLBBIO06Prev\" class=3D\"prev\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._track=\r\nPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Previous_link/To_Previous_lightbox_frame=\r\n&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREVIOUS</a>=0D=0A                =0D=0A\t       =\r\n </div>=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio\"=\r\n>=0D=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageLBBIO06\" title=\r\n=3D\"Will Casselton\" src=3D\"Images/bio/6.%20Will%20Casselton.jpg\" alt=3D\"Wil=\r\nl Casselton\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio-detail\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t=\r\n\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=0A                        Will Casselton=0D=\r\n=0A                        </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=\r\n=0A                        Partner, People=0D=0A                        </s=\r\npan>=0D=0A                        <p>Will joined McKinney Rogers in January=\r\n 2010 as a member of the global leadership team with responsibility for Peo=\r\nple and to develop People Performance propositions aligned to the Mission L=\r\neadership=C2=AE business execution philosophy. Will has achieved success in=\r\n careers in management consultancy and human resource management internatio=\r\nnally. Prior to joining McKinney Rogers, Will operated as an HR leader for =\r\nthe Emerging Markets of a Global Life Insurer with responsibility for Asia =\r\nPacific and Middle East.</p>=0D=0A<p>&nbsp</p>=0D=0A<p>Previously, Will was=\r\n a founding team member of a boutique talent management and executive searc=\r\nh consultancy based in London where he successfully developed retained rela=\r\ntionships with leading clients working in Europe and the US in Financial Se=\r\nrvices, Healthcare, Retail and Energy. In his early career, Will worked for=\r\n a leading Management Consulting firm in London where he was made a Partner=\r\n in 2004 with responsibility for leading client engagements across a broad =\r\nnumber of sectors for FTSE100 and Fortune 500 clients specializing in Peopl=\r\ne & Organization projects.</p>=0D=0A<p>&nbsp</p>=0D=0A<p>Will is a Politica=\r\nl Science graduate from the Universities of Leicester and Turin. He is base=\r\nd between New York and Barbados where he lives with his wife and three youn=\r\ng children.</p>=0D=0A                    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A      =\r\n      </div>=0D=0A class=3D\"contentinterior\">=0D=0A            <di=\r\nv id=3D\"leftcol\">=0D=0A                <p>The challenge to close the gap be=\r\ntween strategy and execution is increasing. Why? Because the world we live =\r\nin is becoming increasingly competitive, chaotic, unpredictable, and challe=\r\nnging. Internally, businesses are struggling to prioritize, allocate resour=\r\nces effectively, align their matrixes of business units and build the capab=\r\nilities required to deliver sustainable growth. Externally, we are navigati=\r\nng one of the most challenging business environments witnessed in the last =\r\nhalf-century.</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A       =\r\n         <p>Success depends on not just having a great strategy, but on an =\r\norganizations=E2=80=99 ability to navigate this uncertain world and execute=\r\n that strategy brilliantly.</p><p>This is where Mission Leadership comes in=\r\n.</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"main-content-nb\">=0D=0A        \t<di=\r\nv id=3D\"c2\"></div>\t\t\t\t=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"greybox\">=0D=0A id=3D\"leftcol\">=\r\n=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    We apply the philosophy =\r\nof Mission Leadership to drive superior business performance. Mission Leade=\r\nrship is a truly holistic approach to business execution and starts with un=\r\nderstanding the aspirational vision for the organization. Once an organizat=\r\nion has clarity on =E2=80=9Cwhere it is going,=E2=80=9D each individual mus=\r\nt understand =E2=80=9Cwhat is my role in achieving it?=E2=80=9D =0D=0A     =\r\n           </p>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <div id=3D\"rightco=\r\nl\">=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    This clarity drives a=\r\nlignment, instills a sense of personal accountability, and promotes the ind=\r\nependent thought and agility necessary to deliver mission-critical results =\r\ndespite obstacles faced. It requires outstanding leadership and high perfor=\r\nmance teamwork to be successful.=0D=0A                </p>=0D=0A           =\r\n     <p>=0D=0A                    <strong>Case Study:</strong><br />=0D=0A =\r\n                   <a href=3D\"Case_Studies.aspx?ID=3DC6\">Wirtz Beverage Gro=\r\nup Partners with McKinney Rogers=C2=AE to Achieve Leadership Vision, Perfor=\r\nmance and Growth despite Downturn</a>=0D=0A                </p>=0D=0A      =\r\n      </div>=0D=0A            <div id=3D\"main-content-nb\">=0D=0A           =\r\n     <table id=3D\"c1\">=0D=0A                    <tr>=0D=0A                 =\r\n       <td>=0D=0A                        </td>=0D=0A                    </t=\r\nr>=0D=0A                </table>=0D=0A                =0D=0A               =\r\n <div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_MyAccordion\">=0D=0A\t<input type=3D\"hidden\" na=\r\nme=3D\"ctl00$MainContent$MyAccordion_AccordionExtender_ClientState\" id=3D\"ct=\r\nl00_MainContent_MyAccordion_AccordionExtender_ClientState\" value=3D\"1\" /><d=\r\niv id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane0_header\" class=3D\"accordionHeader\"=\r\n>=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                            =0D=0A\t</div><div id=3D\"ctl00_Ma=\r\ninContent_AccordionPane0_content\" class=3D\"accordionContent\" style=3D\"displ=\r\nay:none;\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                            =0D=0A\t</div><div id=3D=\r\n\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane1_header\" class=3D\"accordionHeaderSelected\"=\r\n>=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                                <table class=3D\"accordianHea=\r\nderTable\" id=3D\"headerAP01\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPagevie=\r\nw('/What_We_Do/Mission_Planning_CTA_Bar/To_Mission_Panning_panel_displayed'=\r\n);\">=0D=0A                                    <tr>=0D=0A                   =\r\n                     <td>=0D=0A                                            =\r\nMISSION PLANNING - Every organization must have an aspirational=\r\n vision, or destination, which is time bound. The organizational strategy i=\r\ns created against the aspirational vision and the execution activities are =\r\naligned, at every level, function and geography, throughout the organizatio=\r\nn. Mission Planning will challenge current strategies as well help create n=\r\new ones against a single, stated and aspiring vision.=0D=0A                =\r\n                </p>=0D=0A A high performing team h=\r\nelps unlock the competitive advantage, create a streamlined way of working =\r\nand is always looking to improve on yesterday=E2=80=99s performance. padding-bottom: 15px;\">=0D=0A                    =\r\n    <strong>James Cameron</strong><br />=0D=0A                        <p st=\r\nyle=3D\"font-size: x-small; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: normal\">=0D=0A     =\r\n                       James has an enthusiasm for Mission Leadership, whic=\r\nh can only be described as passionate. This has grown over almost thirty ye=\r\nars of practical leadership experience, which started with operational tour=\r\ns as a teenage platoon commander on the streets of Northern Ireland and is =\r\nyet to finish. During his military career James was the youngest instructor=\r\n at the Royal Military Academy Sandhurst, commanded up to battalion level o=\r\nn operations and was twice chosen to be personal executive officer to the B=\r\nritish Army=E2=80=99s most senior generals. As Assistant Director Counter T=\r\nerrorism in the Ministry of Defense he initiated a strategic program of tra=\r\nining and assistance to counties willing to partner in the global struggle =\r\nagainst one of the most pressing contemporary threats. The last three years=\r\n of work in the private sector have honed those experiences and he has succ=\r\nessfully translated them into solutions for business, using instinct, innov=\r\nation and core principles to achieve exceptional outcomes.=0D=0A           =\r\n             </p>=0D=0A                    </td>=0D=0A                </tr>=\r\n=0D=0A                <tr>=0D=0A                    <td style=3D\"padding-ri=\r\nght: 15px; padding-left: 15px; padding-bottom: 15px;\">=0D=0A               =\r\n         <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_BIO3Image\" src=3D\"Images/NYbio/PippaP=\r\nomeroy.jpg\" align=3D\"middle\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A                    </td>=\r\n=0D=0A                    <td style=3D\"color: #FFFFFF; padding-right: 15px;=\r\n padding-bottom: 15px;\">=0D=0A                        <strong>Pippa Pomeroy=\r\n</strong><br />=0D=0A                        <p style=3D\"font-size: x-small=\r\n; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: normal\">=0D=0A                            Pi=\r\nppa joined McKinney Rogers in October 2009 as a US Partner after 19 years a=\r\ns a Logistics Officer in the Royal Navy.  She chose to join the Royal Navy =\r\nwhen women became eligible for sea service in 1990.  She was one of the fir=\r\nst women to undertake fully integrated Naval Officer training. In 2001 , ha=\r\nving demonstrated a clear passion for training and development, she was sel=\r\nected to join the Navy=E2=80=99s Operational Sea Training Staff.<br />Pippa=\r\n=E2=80=99s  final Naval assignment was as the Personal Staff Officer to the=\r\n Royal Navy=E2=80=99s COO,  responsible for coordinating activity within th=\r\ne Navy Command Headquarters during a period of great organizational change =\r\nand sustained operational activity.  A firm believer in the power of Missio=\r\nn Leadership, Pippa brings experience of leadership under pressure, decisio=\r\nn-making processes in complex organizations and a real passion for educatio=\r\nn and talent development=0D=0A                        </p>=0D=0A           =\r\n         </td>=0D=0A                </tr>=0D=0A                <tr>=0D=0A  =\r\n                  <td style=3D\"padding-right: 15px; padding-left: 15px; pad=\r\nding-bottom: 15px;\">=0D=0A                        <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainCont=\r\nent_BIO4Image\" src=3D\"Images/NYbio/BrandonShelton.jpg\" align=3D\"middle\" bor=\r\nder=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A                    </td>=0D=0A                    <td st=\r\nyle=3D\"color: #FFFFFF; padding-right: 15px; padding-bottom: 15px;\">=0D=0A  =\r\n                      <strong>Brandon Shelton</strong><br />=0D=0A         =\r\n               <p style=3D\"font-size: x-small; color: #FFFFFF; line-height:=\r\n normal\">=0D=0A                            Brandon joined McKinney Rogers i=\r\nn 2008 and has a proven track record of embracing challenges in both the co=\r\nmmercial and military arenas and then turning strategy into decisive and ef=\r\nfective actions. Brandon=E2=80=99s rapid transition from military officer t=\r\no Wall Street trader is a testament to his ability to forecast, analyze and=\r\n leverage large amounts of information to make swift and effective decision=\r\ns. He helped grow businesses at Bear Stearns and Barclays Capital Inc. not =\r\nonly through technical strategy and execution but also by establishing proc=\r\nesses to achieve efficiencies, provide greater customer service, and mitiga=\r\nte risk. He has an MBA from Duke University and a B.S. degree from the Univ=\r\nersity of Richmond. He enjoys Triathlons, reading, traveling and supporting=\r\n Veterans=E2=80=99 advocacy organizations.=0D=0A                        </p=\r\n>=0D=0A                    </td>=0D=0A                </tr>=0D=0A          =\r\n      =0D=0A                <tr>=0D=0A                    <td style=3D\"padd=\r\ning-right: 15px; padding-left: 15px; padding-bottom: 15px;\">=0D=0A         =\r\n               <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_BIO6Image\" src=3D\"Images/NYbio/=\r\nIanDunnington.jpg\" align=3D\"middle\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A                  =\r\n  </td>=0D=0A                    <td style=3D\"color: #FFFFFF; padding-right=\r\n: 15px; padding-bottom: 15px;\">=0D=0A                        <strong>Ian Du=\r\nnnington</strong><br />=0D=0A                        <p style=3D\"font-size:=\r\n x-small; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: normal\">=0D=0A                      =\r\n      Ian Dunnington joined McKinney Rogers in 2008 and quickly became reco=\r\ngnized for strategic breakthroughs and successes for clients in a cross sec=\r\ntion of industry verticals such as the Alcohol Beverage, Retail, Airline, a=\r\nnd Manufacturing sectors.   Ian currently runs our expansion efforts in the=\r\n New York area and leads a team out of our New York City office. Ian has a =\r\nsuccessful record of leadership in Corporate America with over 14 years of =\r\nexperience in operations, global business development & sales, and marketin=\r\ng management.  Throughout his career Ian has been able to dramatically grow=\r\n market share and sustainable processes in companies focused on technology =\r\nsolutions and project support in the Federal Government and Department of D=\r\nefence contracting space.  He is a motivator who keeps people focused on th=\r\ne goal rather than themselves. He is a mediator who finds common ground amo=\r\nng disparate factions and a communicator who believes that people work best=\r\n when informed about that which affects them.=0D=0A                        =\r\n</p>=0D=0A                    </td>=0D=0A                </tr>=0D=0A       =\r\n         </table>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t<div id=3D\"c8\" clas=\r\ns=3D\"popup-wrap2\" rel=3D\"contactrel\">=0D=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=\r\n=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBLoc08Prev\" class=3D\"prev\"=\r\n onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Contact_Us/Lightbox=\r\n_Previous_link/To_Previous_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREVIOU=\r\nS</a>=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBLoc08Next\" class=\r\n=3D\"next\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Contact_Us=\r\n/Lightbox_Next_link/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEXT =C2=BB</=\r\na>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"=\r\ncontactinfo1\">=0D=0A                    <strong>Sao Paulo</strong><br/>23=\r\n=C2=B0 32' S / 46=C2=B0 38' W<br /><br/><strong>McKinney Rogers Sao Paulo</=\r\nstrong><br/>Rua Hungria, n=C2=BA 574 - conj. 112.<br/>S=C3=A3o Paulo - SP J=\r\nd. id=\r\n=3D\"leftcol\">=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    We apply th=\r\ne philosophy of Mission Leadership to drive superior business performance. =\r\nMission Leadership is a truly holistic approach to business execution and s=\r\ntarts with understanding the aspirational vision for the organization. Once=\r\n an organization has clarity on =E2=80=9Cwhere it is going,=E2=80=9D each i=\r\nndividual must understand =E2=80=9Cwhat is my role in achieving it?=E2=80=\r\n=9D =0D=0A                </p>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <di=\r\nv id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    This c=\r\nlarity drives alignment, instills a sense of personal accountability, and p=\r\nromotes the independent thought and agility necessary to deliver mission-cr=\r\nitical results despite obstacles faced. It requires outstanding leadership =\r\nand high performance teamwork to be successful.=0D=0A                </p>=\r\n=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    <strong>Case Study:</str=\r\nong><br />=0D=0A                    <a href=3D\"Case_Studies.aspx?ID=3DC6\">W=\r\nirtz Beverage Group Partners with McKinney Rogers=C2=AE to Achieve Leadersh=\r\nip Vision, Performance and Growth despite Downturn</a>=0D=0A               =\r\n </p>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <div id=3D\"main-content-nb\">=\r\n=0D=0A                <table id=3D\"c1\">=0D=0A                    <tr>=0D=0A=\r\n                        <td>=0D=0A                        </td>=0D=0A      =\r\n              </tr>=0D=0A                </table>=0D=0A                =0D=\r\n=0A                <div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_MyAccordion\">=0D=0A\t<input =\r\ntype=3D\"hidden\" name=3D\"ctl00$MainContent$MyAccordion_AccordionExtender_Cli=\r\nentState\" id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_MyAccordion_AccordionExtender_ClientState=\r\n\" value=3D\"1\" /><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane0_header\" class=\r\n=3D\"accordionHeader\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                            =0D=0A\t</div=\r\n><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane0_content\" class=3D\"accordionCon=\r\ntent\" style=3D\"display:none;\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                            =0D=\r\n=0A\t</div><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane1_header\" class=3D\"acco=\r\nrdionHeaderSelected\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                                <table c=\r\nlass=3D\"accordianHeaderTable\" id=3D\"headerAP01\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageT=\r\nracker._trackPageview('/What_We_Do/Mission_Planning_CTA_Bar/To_Mission_Pann=\r\ning_panel_displayed');\">=0D=0A                                    <tr>=0D=\r\n=0A                                        <td>=0D=0A                      =\r\n                      MISSION PLANNING - Every organization must=\r\n have an aspirational vision, or destination, which is time bound. The orga=\r\nnizational strategy is created against the aspirational vision and the exec=\r\nution activities are aligned, at every level, function and geography, throu=\r\nghout the organization. Mission Planning will challenge current strategies =\r\nas well help create new ones against a single, stated and aspiring vision.=\r\n=0D=0A                                </p>=0D=0A the alignment of the b=\r\nusiness strategy throughout the leadership of an organization. These cascad=\r\ning sessions help drive clarity and alignment through the organization so t=\r\nhat every individual fully understands their Part in the Plan, their operat=\r\ning boundaries, and what the priorities are to achieve their Mission. Trans=\r\nparency, accountability, confidence and commitment are all desired outcomes=\r\n. The Mission Status Review (MSR) process, conducted as regular follow up m=\r\neetings, provides long-term handrail support and discipline for teams to tr=\r\nuly adopt the ML philosophy and achieve their Missions throughout the fisca=\r\nl year.=0D=0A                                </p>=0D=0A                    =\r\n            <div class=3D\"accordioncolumnwrapper clearfix\">=0D=0A id=\r\n=3D\"leftcol\">=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    We apply th=\r\ne philosophy of Mission Leadership to drive superior business performance. =\r\nMission Leadership is a truly holistic approach to business execution and s=\r\ntarts with understanding the aspirational vision for the organization. Once=\r\n an organization has clarity on =E2=80=9Cwhere it is going,=E2=80=9D each i=\r\nndividual must understand =E2=80=9Cwhat is my role in achieving it?=E2=80=\r\n=9D =0D=0A                </p>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <di=\r\nv id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    This c=\r\nlarity drives alignment, instills a sense of personal accountability, and p=\r\nromotes the independent thought and agility necessary to deliver mission-cr=\r\nitical results despite obstacles faced. It requires outstanding leadership =\r\nand high performance teamwork to be successful.=0D=0A                </p>=\r\n=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    <strong>Case Study:</str=\r\nong><br />=0D=0A                    <a href=3D\"Case_Studies.aspx?ID=3DC6\">W=\r\nirtz Beverage Group Partners with McKinney Rogers=C2=AE to Achieve Leadersh=\r\nip Vision, Performance and Growth despite Downturn</a>=0D=0A               =\r\n </p>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <div id=3D\"main-content-nb\">=\r\n=0D=0A                <table id=3D\"c1\">=0D=0A                    <tr>=0D=0A=\r\n                        <td>=0D=0A                        </td>=0D=0A      =\r\n              </tr>=0D=0A                </table>=0D=0A                =0D=\r\n=0A                <div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_MyAccordion\">=0D=0A\t<input =\r\ntype=3D\"hidden\" name=3D\"ctl00$MainContent$MyAccordion_AccordionExtender_Cli=\r\nentState\" id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_MyAccordion_AccordionExtender_ClientState=\r\n\" value=3D\"2\" /><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane0_header\" class=\r\n=3D\"accordionHeader\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                            =0D=0A\t</div=\r\n><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane0_content\" class=3D\"accordionCon=\r\ntent\" style=3D\"display:none;\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                            =0D=\r\n=0A\t</div><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane1_header\" class=3D\"acco=\r\nrdionHeader\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                                <table class=3D\"=\r\naccordianHeaderTable\" id=3D\"headerAP01\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._=\r\ntrackPageview('/What_We_Do/Mission_Planning_CTA_Bar/To_Mission_Panning_pane=\r\nl_displayed');\">=0D=0A                                    <tr>=0D=0A       =\r\n                                 <td>=0D=0A                                =\r\n            MISSION PLANNING - Setting the Vision=0D=0A                    =\r\n                    </td>=0D=0A                                    </tr>=0D=\r\n=0A                                </table>=0D=0A                          =\r\n  =0D=0A\t</div><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane1_content\" class=\r\n=3D\"accordionContent\" style=3D\"display:none;\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A               =\r\n                 <div class=3D\"panelthumb\">=0D=0A                          =\r\n          <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane1_content_imageMissionP=\r\nlanningLOGO\" src=3D\"Images/MissionPlanningLOGO.png\" align=3D\"middle\" border=\r\n=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A                                </div>=0D=0A                =\r\n                <p>=0D=0A                                    Transform the =\r\nway leadership teams think about strategy in order to ensure that the team =\r\nis ready and able to beat the competition. Every organization must have an =\r\naspirational vision, or destination, which is time bound. The organizationa=\r\nl strategy is created against the aspirational vision and the execution act=\r\nivities are aligned, at every level, function and geography, throughout the=\r\n organization. Mission Planning will challenge current strategies as well h=\r\nelp create new ones against a single, stated and aspiring vision.=0D=0A    =\r\n                            </p>=0D=0A                             </div>=0D=0A                                <=\r\np>=0D=0A                                    It is not enough to simply know=\r\n where you are going, but it is essential to have the right culture in plac=\r\ne. This is a high performance culture, the ability to run at the pace of th=\r\ne fastest person, with excellent behaviors and operating standards. A high =\r\nperforming team helps unlock the competitive advantage, create a streamline=\r\nd way of working and is always looking to improve on yesterday=E2=80=99s pe=\r\nrformance. This is not team building, we provide a roadmap/scorecard for th=\r\ne team in order to teach them the behaviors they need to become a High Perf=\r\norming Team. id=\r\n=3D\"leftcol\">=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    We apply th=\r\ne philosophy of Mission Leadership to drive superior business performance. =\r\nMission Leadership is a truly holistic approach to business execution and s=\r\ntarts with understanding the aspirational vision for the organization. Once=\r\n an organization has clarity on =E2=80=9Cwhere it is going,=E2=80=9D each i=\r\nndividual must understand =E2=80=9Cwhat is my role in achieving it?=E2=80=\r\n=9D =0D=0A                </p>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <di=\r\nv id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    This c=\r\nlarity drives alignment, instills a sense of personal accountability, and p=\r\nromotes the independent thought and agility necessary to deliver mission-cr=\r\nitical results despite obstacles faced. It requires outstanding leadership =\r\nand high performance teamwork to be successful.=0D=0A                </p>=\r\n=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    <strong>Case Study:</str=\r\nong><br />=0D=0A                    <a href=3D\"Case_Studies.aspx?ID=3DC6\">W=\r\nirtz Beverage Group Partners with McKinney Rogers=C2=AE to Achieve Leadersh=\r\nip Vision, Performance and Growth despite Downturn</a>=0D=0A               =\r\n </p>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <div id=3D\"main-content-nb\">=\r\n=0D=0A                <table id=3D\"c1\">=0D=0A                    <tr>=0D=0A=\r\n                        <td>=0D=0A                        </td>=0D=0A      =\r\n              </tr>=0D=0A                </table>=0D=0A                =0D=\r\n=0A                <div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_MyAccordion\">=0D=0A\t<input =\r\ntype=3D\"hidden\" name=3D\"ctl00$MainContent$MyAccordion_AccordionExtender_Cli=\r\nentState\" id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_MyAccordion_AccordionExtender_ClientState=\r\n\" value=3D\"3\" /><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane0_header\" class=\r\n=3D\"accordionHeader\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                            =0D=0A\t</div=\r\n><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane0_content\" class=3D\"accordionCon=\r\ntent\" style=3D\"display:none;\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                            =0D=\r\n=0A\t</div><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane1_header\" class=3D\"acco=\r\nrdionHeader\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                                <table class=3D\"=\r\naccordianHeaderTable\" id=3D\"headerAP01\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._=\r\ntrackPageview('/What_We_Do/Mission_Planning_CTA_Bar/To_Mission_Panning_pane=\r\nl_displayed');\">=0D=0A                                    <tr>=0D=0A       =\r\n                                 <td>=0D=0A                                =\r\n            MISSION PLANNING - Setting the Vision=0D=0A                    =\r\n                    </td>=0D=0A                                    </tr>=0D=\r\n=0A                                </table>=0D=0A                          =\r\n  =0D=0A\t</div><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane1_content\" class=\r\n=3D\"accordionContent\" style=3D\"display:none;\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A               =\r\n                 <div class=3D\"panelthumb\">=0D=0A                          =\r\n          <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane1_content_imageMissionP=\r\nlanningLOGO\" src=3D\"Images/MissionPlanningLOGO.png\" align=3D\"middle\" border=\r\n=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A                                </div>=0D=0A                =\r\n                <p>=0D=0A                                    Transform the =\r\nway leadership teams think about strategy in order to ensure that the team =\r\nis ready and able to beat the competition. Every organization must have an =\r\naspirational vision, or destination, which is time bound. The organizationa=\r\nl strategy is created against the aspirational vision and the execution act=\r\nivities are aligned, at every level, function and geography, throughout the=\r\n organization. Mission Planning will challenge current strategies as well h=\r\nelp create new ones against a single, stated and aspiring vision.=0D=0A    =\r\n                            </p>=0D=0A =0D=0A\t</div><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_Accor=\r\ndionPane6_content\" class=3D\"accordionContent\" style=3D\"display:none;\">=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t=0D=0A                                <div class=3D\"panelthumb\">=0D=0A=\r\n                                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionP=\r\nane6_content_image5\" src=3D\"Images/IntegratedBusinessLeadershipLOGO.png\" al=\r\nign=3D\"middle\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A                                </div>=\r\n=0D=0A                                <p>=0D=0A                            =\r\n        To succeed in today=E2=80=99s turbulent global marketplace, compani=\r\nes need leaders at every level who understand how to adapt =E2=80=93 not ju=\r\nst to conditions within their specific area of responsibility =E2=80=93 but=\r\n based upon the needs of the organization as a whole. The ability to identi=\r\nfy and take advantage of opportunities small and large every day comes from=\r\n understanding the perspective of others =E2=80=93 their goals, challenges,=\r\n and ways of working. IBL is all about being able to allow you to instantly=\r\n move into a new role and be able to execute from day one.=0D=0A           =\r\n                     </p>=0D=0A id=\r\n=3D\"leftcol\">=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    We apply th=\r\ne philosophy of Mission Leadership to drive superior business performance. =\r\nMission Leadership is a truly holistic approach to business execution and s=\r\ntarts with understanding the aspirational vision for the organization. Once=\r\n an organization has clarity on =E2=80=9Cwhere it is going,=E2=80=9D each i=\r\nndividual must understand =E2=80=9Cwhat is my role in achieving it?=E2=80=\r\n=9D =0D=0A                </p>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <di=\r\nv id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    This c=\r\nlarity drives alignment, instills a sense of personal accountability, and p=\r\nromotes the independent thought and agility necessary to deliver mission-cr=\r\nitical results despite obstacles faced. It requires outstanding leadership =\r\nand high performance teamwork to be successful.=0D=0A                </p>=\r\n=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    <strong>Case Study:</str=\r\nong><br />=0D=0A                    <a href=3D\"Case_Studies.aspx?ID=3DC6\">W=\r\nirtz Beverage Group Partners with McKinney Rogers=C2=AE to Achieve Leadersh=\r\nip Vision, Performance and Growth despite Downturn</a>=0D=0A               =\r\n </p>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <div id=3D\"main-content-nb\">=\r\n=0D=0A                <table id=3D\"c1\">=0D=0A                    <tr>=0D=0A=\r\n                        <td>=0D=0A                        </td>=0D=0A      =\r\n              </tr>=0D=0A                </table>=0D=0A                =0D=\r\n=0A                <div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_MyAccordion\">=0D=0A\t<input =\r\ntype=3D\"hidden\" name=3D\"ctl00$MainContent$MyAccordion_AccordionExtender_Cli=\r\nentState\" id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_MyAccordion_AccordionExtender_ClientState=\r\n\" value=3D\"4\" /><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane0_header\" class=\r\n=3D\"accordionHeader\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                            =0D=0A\t</div=\r\n><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane0_content\" class=3D\"accordionCon=\r\ntent\" style=3D\"display:none;\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                            =0D=\r\n=0A\t</div><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane1_header\" class=3D\"acco=\r\nrdionHeader\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A                                <table class=3D\"=\r\naccordianHeaderTable\" id=3D\"headerAP01\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._=\r\ntrackPageview('/What_We_Do/Mission_Planning_CTA_Bar/To_Mission_Panning_pane=\r\nl_displayed');\">=0D=0A                                    <tr>=0D=0A       =\r\n                                 <td>=0D=0A                                =\r\n            MISSION PLANNING - Setting the Vision=0D=0A                    =\r\n                    </td>=0D=0A                                    </tr>=0D=\r\n=0A                                </table>=0D=0A                          =\r\n  =0D=0A\t</div><div id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane1_content\" class=\r\n=3D\"accordionContent\" style=3D\"display:none;\">=0D=0A\t\t=0D=0A               =\r\n                 <div class=3D\"panelthumb\">=0D=0A                          =\r\n          <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_AccordionPane1_content_imageMissionP=\r\nlanningLOGO\" src=3D\"Images/MissionPlanningLOGO.png\" align=3D\"middle\" border=\r\n=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A                                </div>=0D=0A                =\r\n                <p>=0D=0A                                    Transform the =\r\nway leadership teams think about strategy in order to ensure that the team =\r\nis ready and able to beat the competition. Every organization must have an =\r\naspirational vision, or destination, which is time bound. The organizationa=\r\nl strategy is created against the aspirational vision and the execution act=\r\nivities are aligned, at every level, function and geography, throughout the=\r\n organization. Mission Planning will challenge current strategies as well h=\r\nelp create new ones against a single, stated and aspiring vision.=0D=0A    =\r\n                            </p>=0D=0A Once=\r\n an organization has clarity on =E2=80=9Cwhere it is going,=E2=80=9D each i=\r\nndividual must understand =E2=80=9Cwhat is my role in achieving it?=E2=80=\r\n=9D =0D=0A                </p>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <di=\r\nv id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    This c=\r\nlarity drives alignment, instills a sense of personal accountability, and p=\r\nromotes the independent thought and agility necessary to deliver mission-cr=\r\nitical results despite obstacles faced. Every organization must have an =\r\naspirational vision, or destination, which is time bound. The organizationa=\r\nl strategy is created against the aspirational vision and the execution act=\r\nivities are aligned, at every level, function and geography, throughout the=\r\n organization. Mission Planning will challenge current strategies as well h=\r\nelp create new ones against a single, stated and aspiring vision.=0D=0A    =\r\n                            </p>=0D=0A the alignment of the business str=\r\nategy throughout the leadership of an organization. These cascading session=\r\ns help drive clarity and alignment through the organization so that every i=\r\nndividual fully understands their Part in the Plan, their operating boundar=\r\nies, and what the priorities are to achieve their Mission. Transparency, ac=\r\ncountability, confidence and commitment are all desired outcomes. The Missi=\r\non Status Review (MSR) process, conducted as regular follow up meetings, pr=\r\novides long-term handrail support and discipline for teams to truly adopt t=\r\nhe ML philosophy and achieve their Missions throughout the fiscal year.=0D=\r\n=0A                                </p>=0D=0A                              =\r\n  <div class=3D\"accordioncolumnwrapper clearfix\">=0D=0A                           </td>=0D=0A                =\r\n                    </tr>=0D=0A                                </table>=0D=\r\n=0A                            =0D=0A\t</div><div Competitor and Market events are actively prom=\r\noted by supporting teams to challenge the strategy and leadership of the bu=\r\nsiness. Key outcomes include a better-aligned plan with increased chances f=\r\nor success, identified contingencies and confidence within the team.=0D=0A =\r\n                               </p>=0D=0A Once=\r\n an organization has clarity on =E2=80=9Cwhere it is going,=E2=80=9D each i=\r\nndividual must understand =E2=80=9Cwhat is my role in achieving it?=E2=80=\r\n=9D =0D=0A                </p>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <di=\r\nv id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A                <p>=0D=0A                    This c=\r\nlarity drives alignment, instills a sense of personal accountability, and p=\r\nromotes the independent thought and agility necessary to deliver mission-cr=\r\nitical results despite obstacles faced.                             </div>=0D=0A                                <=\r\np>=0D=0A                                    It is not enough to simply know=\r\n where you are going, but it is essential to have the right culture in plac=\r\ne. This is a high performance culture, the ability to run at the pace of th=\r\ne fastest person, with excellent behaviors and operating standards. A high =\r\nperforming team helps unlock the competitive advantage, create a streamline=\r\nd way of working and is always looking to improve on yesterday=E2=80=99s pe=\r\nrformance. This is not team building, we provide a roadmap/scorecard for th=\r\ne team in order to teach them the behaviors they need to become a High Perf=\r\norming Team. id=3D\"contentwr=\r\napper\" class=3D\"clearfix\">=0D=0A    <div id=3D\"hero-interior\">=0D=0A    <im=\r\ng id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageWhoWeAreHero\" title=3D\"WHO WE ARE\" class=3D\"=\r\nherolarge\" src=3D\"Images/hero/whoweare-hero.jpg\" alt=3D\"WHO WE ARE\" border=\r\n=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t</div>=0D=0A    <div id=3D\"content\" class=3D\"contentinterio=\r\nr clearfix\">=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"leftcol\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<p>=0D=0A               =\r\n    We live in a time of uncertainty. A time of unstable economies, an incr=\r\neasingly competitive marketplace, and political unrest. These are the facts=\r\n of business life. But they are not excuses for failure.=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</p>=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<p>=0D=0A              =\r\n     We are Business Execution professionals and will equip your organizati=\r\non to deliver business critical results regardless of the uncertainties and=\r\n obstacles that you face.=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t<table id=3D\"c=\r\n1\"></table>=0D=0A \t<div id=3D\"main-content-noborder\" class=3D\"clearfix\">=0D=\r\n=0A    \t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"tab-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<!-- the tabs -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<ul =\r\nclass=3D\"tabs\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c1\" >=0D=0A                    <a i=\r\nd=3D\"hlTab1\" class=3D\"w1\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pauseVideo();pageTracker._t=\r\nrackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Our_Purpose_link/To_Our_Purpose_page&#39;);\">=\r\nTab 1</a>=0D=0A                        </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c2\" >=\r\n=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"hlTab2\" class=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascri=\r\npt:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Our_Philosophy_link/To_Our_P=\r\nhilosophy_page&#39;);\">Tab 2</a>=0D=0A                        </li>=0D=0A\t\t=\r\n\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c3\" >=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"hlTab3\" class=3D\"w=\r\n3\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pauseVideo();pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_=\r\nWe_Are/Our_Heritage_link/To_Our_Heritage_page&#39;);\">Tab 3</a>=0D=0A      =\r\n                  </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<!-- tab \"panes\" -->=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"panes\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A        <strong>Inspiri=\r\nng people to achieve the extraordinary.</strong><br /><br />Our Purpose alo=\r\nngside our Values comprise the core of our fabric- our DNA, our ethos. We r=\r\nelentlessly challenge ourselves, each other and our clients to push beyond =\r\nwhat they believe to be currently possible. Beyond the incremental. Our pas=\r\nsion, energy and results inspire a belief in hearts and minds that the extr=\r\naordinary is achievable.<br />=0D=0A   =0D=0A                        </div>=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A       McKinney Rogers=E2=80=99 Mission Leadership p=\r\nhilosophy is based on a proven set of military disciplines and tools called=\r\n Mission Command.<br /><br />This battle-tested platform, which dates back =\r\nto the Napoleonic era, serves as the foundation of operational planning and=\r\n training for some of the world=E2=80=99s most elite special forces, includ=\r\ning the British Royal Marines.<br /><br />We apply the philosophy of Missio=\r\nn Leadership to drive superior business performance. Mission Leadership is =\r\na truly holistic approach to business execution and starts with understandi=\r\nng the aspirational vision for the organization. Once an organization has c=\r\nlarity on =E2=80=9Cwhere it is going,=E2=80=9D each individual must underst=\r\nand =E2=80=9Cwhat is my role in achieving it?=E2=80=9D This clarity drives =\r\nalignment, instills a sense of personal accountability, and promotes the in=\r\ndependent thought and agility necessary to deliver mission-critical results=\r\n despite obstacles faced. It requires outstanding leadership and high perfo=\r\nrmance teamwork to be successful.<br /><br />By assembling elite operators =\r\nwith both military and senior corporate experience, we=E2=80=99ve achieved =\r\na masterful balance of applied military planning and business leadership ex=\r\npertise. These come together to drive business execution solutions that hav=\r\ne consistently proven their value to our clients =E2=80=94 including world-=\r\nclass companies such as Bacardi, Pfizer, Grohe and Wal-Mart.<br /><br />Bor=\r\nn of <a href=3D'#' onclick=3D\"$('#hlTab3').trigger('click');return false;\">=\r\nour proud military heritage</a>, McKinney Rogers=E2=80=99 Mission Leadershi=\r\np is a truly holistic approach to Business Execution.=0D=0A       =0D=0A   =\r\n                        <table class=3D\"tabtable\" border=3D\"0\" cellpadding=\r\n=3D\"0\" cellspacing=3D\"0\">=0D=0A        =\r\n =0D=0A                                    </td>=0D=0A                     =\r\n           </tr>=0D=0A                            </table>=0D=0A           =\r\n                             =0D=0A                        </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t=\r\n\t\t<div>=0D=0A        Our founder and chairman are both veterans of the Brit=\r\nish Royal Marines. They are the leaders who have transferred the tenets of =\r\nMission Command to McKinney Rogers=E2=80=99 <a href=3D'What_We_Do.aspx'>Mis=\r\nsion Leadership</a> approach to Business Execution.<br /><br />When our fou=\r\nnder, Damian McKinney, entered the private sector at the completion of his =\r\n18-year service, he discovered that the Royal Marines=E2=80=99 Mission Comm=\r\nand approach to talent identification and development, process design, proj=\r\nect planning and execution are directly transferable to the business world.=\r\n From this insight, McKinney Rogers was born.<br /><br />Our chairman, Sir =\r\nRobert Fry KBC, CBE, was Commandant General in the Royal Marines and served=\r\n as Deputy Commanding General of Coalition Forces in the Iraq War. Before j=\r\noining McKinney Rogers in 2007, Sir Robert was a Vice President of Hewlett =\r\nPackard and he remains an advisor to HP and a number of other companies in =\r\nthe defense and banking sectors. He is a member of the Royal United Service=\r\ns Institute executive council and a trustee of Help for Heroes.=0D=0A      =\r\n                  =0D=0A                        </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A=0D=0A=0D=0A  =0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"sidebar-wrap\">=0D=0A\t=\r\n\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"sidebar\">=0D=0A\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"sidebar-head\">OUR LEADERSH=\r\nIP TEAM</h3>=0D=0A            <div class=3D\"sidebarintro\">Meet our leadersh=\r\nip team:</div>=0D=0A=0D=0A\t\t\t<ul class=3D\"linklist1\" >=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<li><a id=\r\n=3D\"hlBIO01\" title=3D\"Damian McKinney\" rel=3D\"biorel\" onclick=3D\"javascript=\r\n:pauseVideo();pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Damian_McKinney_l=\r\nink/To_Damian_McKinney_lightbox&#39;);\" href=3D\"#b1\">Damian McKinney =C2=BB=\r\n</a>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\tChief Executive & Founder\t=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<li><a id=\r\n=3D\"hlBIO02\" title=3D\"Sir Robert Fry\" rel=3D\"biorel\" onclick=3D\"javascript:=\r\npauseVideo();pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Sir_Robert_Fry_lin=\r\nk/To_Sir_Robert_Fry_lightbox&#39;);\" href=3D\"#b2\">Sir Robert Fry =C2=BB</a>=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t\t    Executive Chairman\t=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</li>=0D=0A                 <li>=\r\n<a id=3D\"hlBIO11\" title=3D\"John Esposito\" rel=3D\"biorel\" onclick=3D\"javascr=\r\nipt:pauseVideo();pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Sir_Robert_Fry=\r\n_link/To_John_Esposito_lightbox&#39;);\" href=3D\"#b11\">John Esposito =C2=BB<=\r\n/a>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t     Board Director\t=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</li>=0D=0A                <li><=\r\na id=3D\"hlBIO08\" title=3D\"H. z-index:=\r\n 2;\">=0D=0A\t\t<div id=3D\"b1\" class=3D\"popup-wrap\" rel=3D\"biorel\" >=0D=0A\t\t\t<=\r\ndiv class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=0A<!--                <a
