src=3D\"Images/bio=\r\n/1.%20Damian%20McKinney.jpg\" alt=3D\"Damian McKinney\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t=\r\n\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio-detail\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=0A  =\r\n                      Damian McKinney=0D=0A                        </span>=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A                        Chief E=\r\nxecutive & Founder=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A              =\r\n          <p>After a fast-track career with the UK Royal Marines where he s=\r\nerved for 18 years as an operations commando, Damian McKinney entered the p=\r\nrivate sector and discovered that the Royal Marines=E2=80=99 Mission Comman=\r\nd approach to talent management, business process redesign, and project pla=\r\nnning and execution was directly relatable and transferable to the business=\r\n world. </p><p>&nbsp</p><p>In 1999, he founded the company around his love =\r\nof =E2=80=9Creal operational challenges,=E2=80=9D particularly under severe=\r\n pressure and focusing on results. And over the past decade, he has built a=\r\n global organization with offices on every subcontinent, and dedicated to d=\r\nelivering tangible and sustainable results for organizations ranging from W=\r\nalmart to Diageo to Pfizer to Thomson Reuters.</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t=\r\n\t\t</div>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A        </div>=0D=0A        <div id=\r\n=3D\"b2\" class=3D\"popup-wrap\" rel=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"ov=\r\nerdrap\">=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO02Prev\" cla=\r\nss=3D\"prev\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_A=\r\nre/Lightbox_Previous_link/To_Previous_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=\r\n=AB PREVIOUS</a>=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO02N=\r\next\" class=3D\"next\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/=\r\nWho_We_Are/Lightbox_Next_link/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEX=\r\nT =C2=BB</a>=0D=0A\t        </div>=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio\">=0D=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_Mai=\r\nnContent_imageLBBIO02\" title=3D\"Sir Robert Fry\" src=3D\"Images/bio/2.%20Sir%=\r\n20Rob.jpg\" alt=3D\"Sir Robert Fry\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"b=\r\nio-detail\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=0A                     =\r\n   Sir Robert Fry=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span cla=\r\nss=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A                        Executive Chairman=0D=0A    =\r\n                    </span>=0D=0A                        <p>After having ad=\r\nvised McKinney Rogers in a non-executive role since 2007, Sir Robert Fry wa=\r\ns appointed Executive Chairman of the firm in 2010. </p><p>&nbsp</p><p>Befo=\r\nre joining McKinney Rogers, Sir Robert served as EMEA Regional Vice Preside=\r\nnt for Defense & Security at Hewlett-Packard. Prior to that, he had a full =\r\nmilitary career, culminating in an operational tour as Deputy Commanding Ge=\r\nneral of the coalition forces in Iraq. He continues his contribution to the=\r\n military as Colonel of the Special Reconnaissance Regiment. He is also a m=\r\nember of the Royal United Services Institute Executive Council, as well as =\r\na Freeman of the City of London. </p>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=\r\n=0A            </div>=0D=0A        </div>=0D=0A       <div id=3D\"b11\" class=\r\n=3D\"popup-wrap\" rel=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=\r\n=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO11Prev\" class=3D\"prev\"=\r\n onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox=\r\n_Previous_link/To_Previous_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREVIOU=\r\nS</a>=0D=0A                     <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO11Next\" c=\r\nlass=3D\"next\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We=\r\n_Are/Lightbox_Next_link/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEXT =C2=\r\n=BB</a>=0D=0A\t        </div>=0D=0A=0D=0A             <div class=3D\"bios-wra=\r\np\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio\">=0D=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_=\r\nMainContent_imageLBBIO11\" title=3D\"John Esposito\" src=3D\"Images/bio/11.%20J=\r\nohn%20Esposito.jpg\" alt=3D\"John Esposito\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div cl=\r\nass=3D\"bio-detail\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=0A             =\r\n           John Esposito=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<s=\r\npan class=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A                        Board Director=0D=0A =\r\n                       </span>=0D=0A                        <p>John Esposit=\r\no joined McKinney Rogers in November 2011. Previously he was President and =\r\nCEO of Bacardi U.S.A. and Bacardi North America, with responsibility for th=\r\ne United States, Canada and Puerto Rico.</p><p>&nbsp</p>=0D=0A<p>Under his =\r\nleadership, Bacardi established a vision to become the number one value cre=\r\nating premium spirits company in the industry with a portfolio featuring so=\r\nme of the world=E2=80=99s favorite products including Bacardi, Grey Goose, =\r\nBombay Sapphire and Dewar=E2=80=99s Scotch whisky,  Martini and Rossi vermo=\r\nuth in addition to new and emerging brands such Corzo tequila and 42Below v=\r\nodka among others. </p><p>&nbsp</p>=0D=0A<p>Prior to joining Bacardi, he wa=\r\ns President and CEO of Moet Hennessy USA and has also held a number of othe=\r\nr key positions including President and CEO of Shieffelin & Somerset, Presi=\r\ndent of Premier Beverage Co. of Florida, Vice President and Director of Sal=\r\nes for W.A. Taylor & Co., and Vice President, National Sales Manager, Seagr=\r\nam Wine Co. </p><p>&nbsp</p>=0D=0A<p>Mr. Esposito earned a bachelor=E2=80=\r\n=99s degree in business from New York=E2=80=99s Manhattan College and is a =\r\ngraduate of the Harvard University Advanced Management Program for Senior M=\r\nanagers.  Always active in charity fundraising throughout his career, he ha=\r\ns been honored as =E2=80=9CMan of the Year=E2=80=9D by The Boy Scouts of Am=\r\nerica and the United Jewish Appeal, and the industry=E2=80=99s American Can=\r\ncer Society=E2=80=99s Dr. Louis Berger Memorial Award.  In 2002 he received=\r\n a Doctor of Laws Degree from Medgar Evers College for his work in supporti=\r\nng education. He is currently a board member of the Wolfsonian Museum=E2=80=\r\n=94Florida International University and the Thurgood Marshall Scholarship F=\r\noundation. </p><p>&nbsp</p>=0D=0A                    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=\r\n=0D=0A            </div>        =0D=0A        </div>=0D=0A        <div id=\r\n=3D\"b8\" class=3D\"popup-wrap\" rel=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"ov=\r\nerdrap\">=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO08Prev\" cla=\r\nss=3D\"prev\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_A=\r\nre/Lightbox_Previous_link/To_Previous_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=\r\n=AB PREVIOUS</a>=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO08N=\r\next\" class=3D\"next\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/=\r\nWho_We_Are/Lightbox_Next_link/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEX=\r\nT =C2=BB</a>=0D=0A\t        </div>=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio\">=0D=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_Mai=\r\nnContent_imageLBBIO08\" title=3D\"H. Jin Iwamoto=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<spa=\r\nn class=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A                        Partner, Asia=0D=0A    =\r\n                    </span>=0D=0A                        <p>Jin Iwamoto bri=\r\nngs extraordinary business accomplishments, passion and energy to McKinney =\r\nRogers. </p><p>&nbsp</p><p>As CEO of MHD Diageo Moet Hennessy, Japan=E2=80=\r\n=99s top luxury wines and spirits company, he transformed a company with 14=\r\n consecutive years of decline into one with three consecutive years of grow=\r\nth. Prior to that, he was VP Asia Pacific of Schick Wilkinson Sword, where =\r\nhe led the company through M&As under Warner-Lambert, Pfizer and Energizer =\r\nto maintain its position as #1 in the market. Also, as the company=E2=80=99=\r\ns first Global Business Director, he created its first global brand identit=\r\ny, package and new product.</p>=0D=0A                    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</=\r\ndiv>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A        </div>=0D=0A          <div id=3D\"=\r\nb10\" class=3D\"popup-wrap\" rel=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"overd=\r\nrap\">=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO10Prev\" class=\r\n=3D\"prev\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are=\r\n/Lightbox_Previous_link/To_Previous_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=\r\n=AB PREVIOUS</a>=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBI=\r\nO10Next\" class=3D\"next\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#=\r\n39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Next_link/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\"=\r\n>NEXT =C2=BB</a> =0D=0A\t        </div>=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"bios-wra=\r\np\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio\">=0D=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_=\r\nMainContent_imageLBBIO10\" title=3D\"Jed Stone\" src=3D\"Images/bio/10.%20Jed%2=\r\n0Stone.jpg\" alt=3D\"Jed Stone\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio-d=\r\netail\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=0A                        J=\r\ned Stone=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio=\r\n-title\">=0D=0A                        Partner, Europe/Middle East=0D=0A    =\r\n                    </span>=0D=0A                        <p>During his time=\r\n in the Royal Marines, Jed spent six years at Joint Services Mountaineering=\r\n centers as well as three years at the Royal Naval School of Leadership and=\r\n Management Training. He joined the company in 2001 as a lead coach heading=\r\n a team of 10-12 individuals facilitating global conferences and High Perfo=\r\nrmance Team workshops. </p><p>&nbsp</p><p>He is now a Partner covering the =\r\nAlcohol/Beverage Industry, working closely with a number of clients, combin=\r\ning strategic alignment with inspirational leadership and high performance =\r\nbehaviors. Jed has a real passion for enabling others to achieve higher lev=\r\nels of performance.</p><p>&nbsp</p><p>During his 25 years serving in the Ro=\r\nyal Marine Commandos Jed was lucky enough to be a member of a team that bro=\r\nke a world record, competed internationally at sport and was able to undert=\r\nake challenging mountaineering expeditions. This instilled a determination =\r\nto work with people who wanted to be 'high performers'. His family plays th=\r\ne most important part in his life but he also enjoys all outdoor pursuits a=\r\ns well as watching rugby and football.</p>=0D=0A                    </div>=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A            </div>           =0D=0A        </div>=0D=\r\n=0A         <div id=3D\"b9\" class=3D\"popup-wrap\" rel=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t     =\r\n   <div class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent=\r\n_hlLBBIO09Prev\" class=3D\"prev\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPage=\r\nview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Previous_link/To_Previous_lightbox_frame&#39=\r\n;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREVIOUS</a>=0D=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_Mai=\r\nnContent_hlLBBIO09Next\" class=3D\"next\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._t=\r\nrackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Next_link/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39=\r\n;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEXT =C2=BB</a>=0D=0A\t        </div>=0D=0A\t        <div cla=\r\nss=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio\">=0D=0A                    <im=\r\ng id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageLBBIO09\" title=3D\"Chris Stephenson\" src=3D\"I=\r\nmages/bio/9.%20Chris%20Stephenson.jpg\" alt=3D\"Chris Stephenson\" border=3D\"0=\r\n\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio-detail\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-nam=\r\ne\">=0D=0A                        Chris Stephenson=0D=0A                    =\r\n    </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A                    =\r\n    Partner, Africa=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A             =\r\n           <p>McKinney Rogers=E2=80=99 partner in Africa, Chris Stephenson =\r\nspecializes in developing new markets, building organizations and cultivati=\r\nng talent. He has a deep passion for and understanding of the continent and=\r\n its unlimited desire for growth =E2=80=94 commercially, collectively and i=\r\nndividually.</p><p>&nbsp</p><p>Born and raised in East Africa, Chris moved =\r\nto the UK to attend Cambridge University, then enlisted in the British Army=\r\n. Following his military career, he became a corporate star. His most recen=\r\nt stint was Commercial Director of Diageo=E2=80=99s West African business, =\r\nwhere he led a sales force of 350 people that delivered =C2=A340m turnover =\r\nannually, and executed a strategic change program that delivered =C2=A32m a=\r\nnnual savings.</p>=0D=0A                    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A   =\r\n         </div>=0D=0A        </div>=0D=0A        <div id=3D\"b4\" class=3D\"po=\r\npup-wrap\" rel=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=0A     =\r\n           <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO04Prev\" class=3D\"prev\" onclick=\r\n=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Previou=\r\ns_link/To_Previous_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREVIOUS</a>=0D=\r\n=0A                <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO04Next\" class=3D\"next\"=\r\n onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox=\r\n_Next_link/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEXT =C2=BB</a>=0D=0A\t=\r\n        </div>=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=\r\n=3D\"bio\">=0D=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageLBBIO0=\r\n4\" title=3D\"Richard Watts\" src=3D\"Images/bio/4.%20Richard%20Watts.jpg\" alt=\r\n=3D\"Richard Watts\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio-detail\">=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=0A                        Richard Wat=\r\nts=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-title=\r\n\">=0D=0A                        Partner and Chief of Staff=0D=0A           =\r\n             </span>=0D=0A                        <p>As global Chief of Sta=\r\nff, Richard Watts leads all functions that support the front line of our bu=\r\nsiness. He joined McKinney Rogers in 2006, and previously served as Regiona=\r\nl Partner for Europe and the Middle East. He is highly experienced at strat=\r\negic planning, ensuring that client strategy is operationalized into an exe=\r\ncutable plan.</p><p>&nbsp</p><p>Richard came to us with 25 years of experie=\r\nnce as an officer in the Royal Marines, where he led successful missions in=\r\n extreme conditions. He studied at Ashridge and Manchester Business Schools=\r\n. He is a regular contributor to business journals on leadership and has ap=\r\npeared on BBC Business TV. </p>=0D=0A                    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</=\r\ndiv>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A            <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO03Next\" =\r\nclass=3D\"next\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_W=\r\ne_Are/Lightbox_Next_link/To_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEXT =C2=\r\n=BB</a>=0D=0A\t        </div>=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=0A\t=\r\n\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio\">=0D=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainConten=\r\nt_imageLBBIO03\" title=3D\"Russ Thornton\" src=3D\"Images/bio/3.%20Russ%20Thorn=\r\nton.jpg\" alt=3D\"Russ Thornton\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio-=\r\ndetail\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=0A                        =\r\nRuss Thornton=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\r\n=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A                        Chief Technology Officer=0D=0A=\r\n                        </span>=0D=0A                        <p>With over 2=\r\n0 years=E2=80=99 experience delivering global, mission-critical IT solution=\r\ns, Chief Technology Officer Russ Thornton has a passion for quickly transla=\r\nting business needs into technology solutions that drive results. </p><p>&n=\r\nbsp</p><p>Prior to McKinney Rogers, Russ ran a San Francisco-based consulta=\r\nncy providing software and infrastructure solutions to the Real Estate Inve=\r\nstment Trust (REIT) market, and also co-founded m35, a UK-based financial s=\r\noftware company. He has served as Senior Technical Consultant for Reuters o=\r\nn large dealing-room systems integration and development projects; Director=\r\n of Software Development for Dai-Ichi Kangyo Bank in London; and Director o=\r\nf Consulting for Corillian International, creating retail banking websites.=\r\n</p>=0D=0A                    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A            </div=\r\n>=0D=0A        </div>=0D=0A        <div id=3D\"b5\" class=3D\"popup-wrap\" rel=\r\n=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=0A                <a=\r\n id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO05Prev\" class=3D\"prev\" onclick=3D\"javascrip=\r\nt:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Previous_link/To_Pre=\r\nvious_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREVIOUS</a>=0D=0A          =\r\n      <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO05Next\" class=3D\"next\" onclick=3D\"j=\r\navascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Next_link/To=\r\n_Next_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">NEXT =C2=BB</a>=0D=0A\t        </div=\r\n>=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio\">=0D=\r\n=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageLBBIO05\" title=3D\"=\r\nSteven Lindsay\" src=3D\"Images/bio/5.%20Steven%20Lindsay.jpg\" alt=3D\"Steven =\r\nLindsay\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio-detail\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<s=\r\npan class=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=0A                        Steven Lindsay=0D=0A  =\r\n                      </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A  =\r\n                      Partner, Finance=0D=0A                        </span>=\r\n=0D=0A                        <p>Steven joined McKinney Rogers in 2008, he =\r\nhas over 10 years=E2=80=99 experience in all aspects of accounting and busi=\r\nness management. Prior to McKinney Rogers, Steven has held leadership posit=\r\nions in the Manufacturing, IT & Travel sectors. He has been involved in num=\r\nerous Mergers and Acquisitions throughout his career and has a proven track=\r\n record of rapidly transforming finance functions effectiveness.</p>=0D=0A =\r\n                   </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A    =\r\n    </div>      =0D=0A     =0D=0A        <div id=3D\"b6\" class=3D\"popup-wrap=\r\n\" rel=3D\"biorel\">=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"overdrap\">=0D=0A             =\r\n   <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlLBBIO06Prev\" class=3D\"prev\" onclick=3D\"java=\r\nscript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Who_We_Are/Lightbox_Previous_link/T=\r\no_Previous_lightbox_frame&#39;);\" href=3D\"#\">=C2=AB PREVIOUS</a>=0D=0A     =\r\n           =0D=0A\t        </div>=0D=0A\t        <div class=3D\"bios-wrap\">=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"bio\">=0D=0A                    <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainCo=\r\nntent_imageLBBIO06\" title=3D\"Will Casselton\" src=3D\"Images/bio/6.%20Will%20=\r\nCasselton.jpg\" alt=3D\"Will Casselton\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\r\n=3D\"bio-detail\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=3D\"bio-name\">=0D=0A                =\r\n        Will Casselton=0D=0A                        </span>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<spa=\r\nn class=3D\"bio-title\">=0D=0A                        Partner, People=0D=0A  =\r\n                      </span>=0D=0A                        <p>Will joined M=\r\ncKinney Rogers in January 2010 as a member of the global leadership team wi=\r\nth responsibility for People and to develop People Performance propositions=\r\n aligned to the Mission Leadership=C2=AE business execution philosophy. Wil=\r\nl has achieved success in careers in management consultancy and human resou=\r\nrce management internationally. Prior to joining McKinney Rogers, Will oper=\r\nated as an HR leader for the Emerging Markets of a Global Life Insurer with=\r\n responsibility for Asia Pacific and Middle East.</p>=0D=0A<p>&nbsp</p>=0D=\r\n=0A<p>Previously, Will was a founding team member of a boutique talent mana=\r\ngement and executive search consultancy based in London where he successful=\r\nly developed retained relationships with leading clients working in Europe =\r\nand the US in Financial Services, Healthcare, Retail and Energy. In his ear=\r\nly career, Will worked for a leading Management Consulting firm in London w=\r\nhere he was made a Partner in 2004 with responsibility for leading client e=\r\nngagements across a broad number of sectors for FTSE100 and Fortune 500 cli=\r\nents specializing in People & Organization projects.</p>=0D=0A<p>&nbsp</p>=\r\n=0D=0A<p>Will is a Political Science graduate from the Universities of Leic=\r\nester and Turin. He is based between New York and Barbados where he lives w=\r\nith his wife and three young children.</p>=0D=0A                    </div>=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A US</a></li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t    <div id=3D\"contentwrapperMASTER\">=0D=0A\t            =0D=0A    <div=\r\n id=3D\"contentwrapper\" class=3D\"clearfix\">=0D=0A    \t<div id=3D\"hero-interi=\r\nor\">=0D=0A            <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageCaseStudiesHero\" ti=\r\ntle=3D\"CASE STUDIES\" class=3D\"herolarge\" src=3D\"Images/hero/case-hero.jpg\" =\r\nalt=3D\"CASE STUDIES\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t<div id=3D\"conten=\r\nt\" class=3D\"contentinterior\">=0D=0A            <div id=3D\"precol\">=0D=0A   =\r\n             McKinney Rogers Drives a New Global Strategy Across a Matrixed=\r\n Multinational=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"leftcol\">=0D=0A\t\t=\r\n\t\t<p>=0D=0A                    This McKinney Rogers client is one of the mo=\r\nst successful consumer product goods brands in the world. Since the late 19=\r\n90s the brand has been owned by a well-known leading global consumer goods =\r\ncompany.=0D=0A\t    \t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t<p>=0D=0A                    Sold in 150 different markets worldwide=\r\n, 50% of its sales derive from Europe where growth had slowed significantly=\r\n.=0D=0A    \t\t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"tab-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t<!-=\r\n- the tabs -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<ul class=3D\"tabs casetabs\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D=\r\n\"c1\">=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab1\" class=3D\"=\r\nw1\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Case_Studies/Cus=\r\ntomer_Challenge_Tab/To_Customer_Challenge_Tab_displayed&#39;);\">Tab 1</a>=\r\n=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w1\" onclick=3D\"javascri=\r\npt:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Customer_Challenge_Tab/To_Cust=\r\nomer_Challenge_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 1</a> -->=0D=0A                    </l=\r\ni>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c2\">=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_Main=\r\nContent_hlTab2\" class=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPagevi=\r\new(&#39;/Case_Studies/Producing_the_Solution_Tab/To_Producing_the_Solution_=\r\nTab_displayed&#39;);\">Tab 2</a>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" c=\r\nlass=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies=\r\n/Producing_the_Solution_Tab/To_Producing_the_Solution_Tab_displayed');\">Tab=\r\n 2</a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c3\">=0D=0A=\r\n                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab3\" class=3D\"w3\">Tab 3</=\r\na>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w3\" onclick=3D\"javasc=\r\nript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Results_Tab/To_Results_Tab_d=\r\nisplayed');\">Tab 3</a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- tab \"panes\" -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"panes\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>B=\r\nefore the brand=E2=80=99s change of ownership it had belonged to a decentra=\r\nlized organization with a highly fragmented marketing strategy. Despite thi=\r\ns it had performed well due to its prioritized position within the company=\r\n=E2=80=99s portfolio.<br /><br />This was not the case within its new home,=\r\n a highly matrixed organization with a much larger portfolio and limited kn=\r\nowledge of the brand=E2=80=99s market. Consequently the products priority l=\r\nowered and the brand risked becoming even more disjointed within this setti=\r\nng.<br /><br />With the slowing pace of expansion in the brands key markets=\r\n it became especially important to establish a consistent global brand plat=\r\nform and accelerate growth internationally.<br /><br />To survive, therefor=\r\ne, it would have to create a completely new global growth strategy in a hig=\r\nhly matrixed organization. The newly appointed president of the brand=E2=80=\r\n=99s Global Marketing had to align the organization and compel the differen=\r\nt regions in the matrix to support a global growth strategy, a significant =\r\nchallenge as many of the regional decision makers did not view the brand as=\r\n a priority.</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>The brand enlisted the help of business e=\r\nxecution professionals McKinney Rogers to help navigate the matrix structur=\r\ne and leverage the resources of the consumer goods company to help drive a =\r\nnew global brand strategy.<br /><br /><strong>Creating a Global Leadership =\r\nTeam &#8211; the Global Leadership Team</strong><br /><br />The first step =\r\nwas to form the brands Global Leadership Team (GLT). Headed by the presiden=\r\nt of the brand=E2=80=99s Global Marketing, the GLT was also comprised of th=\r\ne global organizations key regional decision makers; a mix of general manag=\r\ners and regional marketing presidents. The aim of the board was to =E2=80=\r\n=9Cbring the matrix into the decision making tent.=E2=80=9D But to get thes=\r\ne disparate parties to align against a common goal as one team, the GLT wou=\r\nld need to enlist McKinney Rogers=E2=80=99 Mission Leadership approach; a b=\r\nusiness application of the military =E2=80=9Cmission command=E2=80=9D strat=\r\negy for highly effective execution despite changing environments.<br /><br =\r\n/><strong>Mission Planning</strong><br /><br />To assist the Board in evalu=\r\nating the brand=E2=80=99s position in the global market and plan accordingl=\r\ny, McKinney Rogers conducted a Mission Planning session. This consisted of =\r\nleading the team through a strategic exercise that enabled them to critical=\r\nly examine the global opportunities and barriers facing the brand, filter i=\r\ndeas and make highly informed decisions about where and how to invest for g=\r\nrowth. The outcome of their analysis was a new aligned global vision for th=\r\ne brand and a concise market classification that placed Africa at the heart=\r\n of the brand=E2=80=99s growth plans and identified the critical need to re=\r\nestablish growth in North America and the Far East.<br /><br /><strong>Miss=\r\nion Analysis</strong><br /><br />By applying Mission Analysis, McKinney Rog=\r\ners helped the GLT to identify the key pillars of the strategy that would b=\r\ne critical to accelerating growth. Improving the consistency and power of t=\r\nhe marketing message was identified as a top priority. Leveraging the GLT, =\r\nthe decision was made to consolidate advertising agencies to drive a single=\r\n, consistent message across the globe based on the new global positioning.<=\r\nbr /><br />Because the decision was made collectively by the GLT, there wer=\r\ne limited obstacles to its execution. Armed with consistent messaging and a=\r\n clearly defined list of target markets, the brand was able to move forward=\r\n with its international expansion, while receiving the full support of appo=\r\ninted GLT members in all of the global organizations targeted regions. Furt=\r\nher underscoring regional collaboration and accountability, each member of =\r\nthe GLT was assigned a specific global growth initiative to champion based =\r\non their interests, skill set, =E2=80=9Cskin in the game=E2=80=9D and passi=\r\nons.<br /><br /><strong>High Performance Teams</strong><br /><br />To ensur=\r\ne the alignment of this revised strategy, McKinney Rogers conducted a Globa=\r\nl Brand Summit, pulling together a team of 130 of the brand=E2=80=99s marke=\r\nters from across the globe. At the heart of this summit was the McKinney Ro=\r\ngers High Performance Team (HPT) methodology that fundamentally changed the=\r\n behaviors in the organization from a market-soloed environment to a unifie=\r\nd extended global brand team, shared best practices and challenged assumpti=\r\nons. The experiential process galvanized the members into one team with a c=\r\nommon way of working and a road map to become an HPT.</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>=\r\n=0D=0A                        In less than 24 months, growth had been accel=\r\nerated in Africa and reestablished in North America and Asia, simultaneousl=\r\ny supporting long-term growth to the brand.<br /><br />=E2=80=9CThe applica=\r\ntion of Mission Leadership was critical to [the brand=E2=80=99s] success ov=\r\ner this period of time. The internal complexity of the newly formed busines=\r\ns, combined with sluggish global growth rates, called into question the org=\r\nanization=E2=80=99s ability to grow this brand,=E2=80=9D explained the bran=\r\nd=E2=80=99s President of Global Marketing. He further added =E2=80=9CBy ali=\r\ngning and inspiring the GLT and wider community to fully commit to a new st=\r\nrategy and global vision for the brand, we were able to cut through the mat=\r\nrix and return [the brand] to stronger growth.=E2=80=9D<br /><br />=0D=0A  =\r\n                      <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlResults\" onclick=3D\"\" hr=\r\nef=3D\"Documents/CaseStudyPDFS/MR%20Drives%20New%20Global%20Strategy%20acros=\r\ns%20a%20Matrixed%20Multinational.pdf\" target=3D\"_blank\">PDF</a>=0D=0A      =\r\n We will not send you promotions or =0D=0A=0D=0Aannouncements unles=\r\ns you give us permission to do so.<br /><br />=E2=80=A2 We may also use or =\r\ndisclose information to resolve disputes, investigate =0D=0A=0D=0Aproblems,=\r\n or enforce our <a href=3D\"Terms_Of_Use.aspx\" style=3D\"color:Blue\">Terms of=\r\n Use</a>. We may disclose or access information whenever we belie=\r\nve in good faith that the law requires or if we otherwise =0D=0A=0D=0Aconsi=\r\nder it necessary to do so to maintain service, improve our products and ser=\r\nvices, and protect the legal rights of McKinney Rogers, its =0D=0A=0D=0Aemp=\r\nloyees, agents and contractors, or to protect the safety and security of vi=\r\nsitors to our web sites; to protect against fraud or for risk =0D=0A=0D=0Am=\r\nanagement purposes.<br /><br />=E2=80=A2 In addition, if McKinney Rogers se=\r\nlls all or part of its business or makes a sale or transfer of assets or =\r\n=0D=0A=0D=0Ais otherwise involved in a merger or business transfer, McKinne=\r\ny Rogers may transfer your information to a third party as part of that =0D=\r\n=0A=0D=0Atransaction.<br /><br />=E2=80=A2 Our system automatically collect=\r\ns your IP address. If you are connected to the Internet you have one, for e=\r\nxample it =0D=0A=0D=0Amay look something like this 198.184.98.9. This infor=\r\nmation is stored in our database log and may be referred to in case of any =\r\ndispute.  We =0D=0A=0D=0Amay also use your IP address to help diagnose prob=\r\nlems with our server, to manage our web site and to enhance our site based =\r\nupon the usage =0D=0A=0D=0Apattern data we receive.<br /><br />=E2=80=A2 We=\r\n may automatically gather general statistical information about our web sit=\r\ne and visitors, such as =0D=0A=0D=0Apages viewed, browsers, number of visit=\r\nors, etc. but in doing so we do not reference you by individual name, e-mai=\r\nl address, home address, or =0D=0A=0D=0Atelephone number.  We use this data=\r\n in the aggregate to determine how much our customers use parts of our webs=\r\nite so that we can improve our =0D=0A=0D=0Asite.  We may provide this infor=\r\nmation to third parties, but when we do so we do not provide personally ide=\r\nntifying information without your =0D=0A=0D=0Apermission.<br /><br />=E2=80=\r\n=A2 We may also obtain personally identifiable information from reputable t=\r\nhird parties. In addition, when we connect =0D=0A=0D=0Ainformation that we =\r\nobtain from third parties with personally identifiable information that we =\r\nhave collected under this Privacy Policy, we =0D=0A=0D=0Awill treat the acq=\r\nuired information like the information that we collected ourselves, and exc=\r\nept as permitted by this Privacy Policy, the =0D=0A=0D=0Ainformation will n=\r\not be shared with third parties.<br /><br /><strong>How to Contact Us</stro=\r\nng><br />If you have any concerns about privacy =0D=0A=0D=0Amatters please =\r\ncontact us at <a href=3D\"mailto:privacy@mckinneyrogers.com\">privacy@mckinne=\r\nyrogers.com</a>.<br /><br /><strong>Third Party =0D=0A=0D=0ASites</strong><=\r\nbr />This privacy policy only covers the McKinney Rogers web site, other li=\r\nnks within this site to other web sites are not =0D=0A=0D=0Acovered by this=\r\n policy.  Once you've left a McKinney Rogers site via a link, you should ch=\r\neck the applicable privacy policy of the third party =0D=0A=0D=0Asite to de=\r\ntermine how they will handle any personally identifiable information they c=\r\nollect from you.<br /><br /><strong>Cookies</strong><br =0D=0A=0D=0A/>As pa=\r\nrt of our service, we use cookies for collecting user information from the =\r\nsite. However, we will not collect any information about you =0D=0A=0D=0Aex=\r\ncept that required for ensuring a high level of service.  A cookie is a sma=\r\nll amount of data that is sent to your browser from a web server =0D=0A=0D=\r\n=0Aand stored on your computer's hard drive.  Generally, we use cookies to =\r\nremind us who you are and enable us to gather statistical information =0D=\r\n=0A=0D=0Aabout usage, research visiting patterns.  Preference and options c=\r\nonfigurations in your browser determine if and how a cookie will be =0D=0A=\r\n=0D=0Aaccepted.  You can change those configurations on your computer if yo=\r\nu desire.  By changing your preferences, you can accept all cookies, you =\r\n=0D=0A=0D=0Acan be notified when a cookie is set, or you can reject all coo=\r\nkies.  If you do so and cookies are disabled, certain features of our site =\r\nmay =0D=0A=0D=0Abe unavailable.<br /><br /><strong>Children Under 13</stron=\r\ng><br />Our site is not intended for children.  If a child under the age of=\r\n 13 has =0D=0A=0D=0Aprovided us with personally-identifiable information, t=\r\nhe parent or guardian should contact us to remove the information at <a =0D=\r\n=0A=0D=0Ahref=3D\"mailto:privacy@mckinneyrogers.com\">privacy@mckinneyrogers.=\r\ncom</a>.<br /><br /><strong>Security</strong><br />We employ reasonable and=\r\n =0D=0A=0D=0Acurrent security methods to prevent unauthorized access, maint=\r\nain data accuracy, and ensure correct use of your information.  Whenever yo=\r\nu =0D=0A=0D=0Avoluntarily disclose personal information online =E2=80=93 fo=\r\nr example through e-mail =E2=80=93 that information can be collected and us=\r\ned by others.  No data =0D=0A=0D=0Atransmission over the Internet or any wi=\r\nreless network can be guaranteed to be perfectly secure.  As a result, whil=\r\ne we try to protect your =0D=0A=0D=0Apersonal information, we cannot ensure=\r\n or guarantee the security of any information you transmit to us, and you d=\r\no so at your own risk.<br =0D=0A=0D=0A/><br /><strong>Changes to Our Policy=\r\n</strong><br />This Privacy Policy became effective as of the date indicate=\r\nd. US</a></li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t    <=\r\n/div>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t    <div id=3D\"contentwrapperMASTER\">=0D=0A\t   =\r\n         =0D=0A    <div id=3D\"contentwrapper\" class=3D\"clearfix\">=0D=0A    =\r\n\t<div id=3D\"hero-interior\">=0D=0A            <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_i=\r\nmageCaseStudiesHero\" title=3D\"CASE STUDIES\" class=3D\"herolarge\" src=3D\"Imag=\r\nes/hero/case-hero.jpg\" alt=3D\"CASE STUDIES\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t</div>=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t<div id=3D\"content\" class=3D\"contentinterior\">=0D=0A            <di=\r\nv id=3D\"precol\">=0D=0A                Wirtz Beverage Group Partners with Mc=\r\nKinney Rogers=C2=AE to Achieve Leadership Vision, Performance and Growth de=\r\nspite Downturn=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"leftcol\">=0D=0A\t\t=\r\n\t\t<p>=0D=0A                    Wirtz Beverage Group (Wirtz Beverage), a div=\r\nision of Chicago-based Wirtz Corporation, is one of the leading alcohol bev=\r\nerage distributors in the country. =0D=0A\t    \t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t=\r\n\t<div id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<p>=0D=0A                    Comprised of a=\r\n staff of more than 3,000 employees, Wirtz Beverage is a multi-state distri=\r\nbutor of wine, beer and spirits and ranks in the top tier of distributors n=\r\nationwide.=0D=0A    \t\t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"tab-wrap\">=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t<!-- the tabs -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<ul class=3D\"tabs casetabs\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li=\r\n class=3D\"c1\">=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab1\" =\r\nclass=3D\"w1\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Case_St=\r\nudies/Customer_Challenge_Tab/To_Customer_Challenge_Tab_displayed&#39;);\">Ta=\r\nb 1</a>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w1\" onclick=3D\"j=\r\navascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Customer_Challenge_Tab/=\r\nTo_Customer_Challenge_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 1</a> -->=0D=0A                =\r\n    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c2\">=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl=\r\n00_MainContent_hlTab2\" class=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trac=\r\nkPageview(&#39;/Case_Studies/Producing_the_Solution_Tab/To_Producing_the_So=\r\nlution_Tab_displayed&#39;);\">Tab 2</a>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=\r\n=3D\"\" class=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_=\r\nStudies/Producing_the_Solution_Tab/To_Producing_the_Solution_Tab_displayed'=\r\n);\">Tab 2</a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c3\"=\r\n>=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab3\" class=3D\"w3\">=\r\nTab 3</a>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w3\" onclick=3D=\r\n\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Results_Tab/To_Result=\r\ns_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 3</a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<=\r\n/ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- tab \"panes\" -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"panes\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t=\r\n\t<div>=0D=0A      =0D=0A      <img style=3D\"float:left;margin-right:24px;ma=\r\nrgin-bottom:8px;\" src=3D\"/Documents/CaseStudyPDFS/WirtzLogo.png\" />    =0D=\r\n=0A      =0D=0A      Wirtz Beverage had grown through multiple acquisitions=\r\n over the past several decades and had reached a size of nine distributors =\r\nspread across five states, each with multi-location operations. =0D=0A     =\r\n <br /><br />=0D=0A      The Company=E2=80=99s leadership recognized that i=\r\nn order to increase performance and grow faster than their competitors, the=\r\ny would have to combine the separate distributors into a high performing te=\r\nam that would function as a single entity.    =0D=0A    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<d=\r\niv>Previously, members of the executive team had worked with McKinney Roger=\r\ns and established an innovative approach to working with their suppliers ba=\r\nsed on alignment and mission planning to achieve success. During this perio=\r\nd Wirtz Beverage recognized that the McKinney Rogers=E2=80=99 approach of t=\r\nurning strategy into action was critical to their success and it became a c=\r\natalyst to align and transform the Company. =E2=80=9CMcKinney Rogers is not=\r\n a team of consultants who take what you give them, recommend a strategy an=\r\nd leave. Their approach to business execution is based on building a holist=\r\nic philosophy they call =E2=80=98Mission Leadership=E2=80=99 so that an org=\r\nanization=E2=80=99s members are aligned, focused on the strategy, and can m=\r\nove forward under any conditions,=E2=80=9D Wirtz Beverage Group President R=\r\nocky Wirtz explained.=0D=0A<br /><br />=0D=0ADespite the economic climate t=\r\nhat Wirtz Beverage confronted in late-2008, the McKinney Rogers team challe=\r\nnged them to raise their level of expectations. Confident that their partne=\r\nrship could transform Wirtz Beverage, McKinney Rogers encouraged the compan=\r\ny to set forth and achieve an ambitious vision statement: to be the leading=\r\n Total Beverage Alcohol (TBA) distributor in the US by December 31st, 2012.=\r\n=0D=0A<br /><br />=0D=0ADuring the course of the relationship McKinney Roge=\r\nrs:=0D=0A<br />=0D=0A&bull;&nbsp;Leveraged Mission Planning=E2=84=A2 to ide=\r\nntify the strategic approach toward achieving the vision;<br />=0D=0A&bull;=\r\n&nbsp;Utilized Mission Alignment=E2=84=A2 to build an agile and flexible st=\r\nrategic narrative from the top of the organization down to the business uni=\r\nts and functions;<br />=0D=0A&bull;&nbsp;Activated the mindset and behavior=\r\n change needed to accomplish the vision with High Performing Team sessions =\r\namong the top 300 leaders in the organization; and<br />=0D=0A&bull;&nbsp;E=\r\nstablished a McKinney Rogers Mission Leadership Dashboard=E2=84=A2 to track=\r\n and measure accomplishments in real-time, providing a continuous window in=\r\nto progress, gaps and opportunities.<br />=0D=0A<br />=0D=0AWorking in part=\r\nnership, Wirtz Beverage and McKinney Rogers developed a series of missions =\r\nfor each leader and operational function, directed by high-performing teams=\r\n that would align and streamline the Company=E2=80=99s nationwide operation=\r\ns. McKinney Rogers has emerged as a long-term trusted advisor when it comes=\r\n to strategy execution. As a result of this successful collaboration, Wirtz=\r\n Beverage again turned to McKinney Rogers to manage the planning, shaping a=\r\nnd successful implementation of a 115-person standalone business unit, the =\r\nAlliance Division, in less than 90 days.=0D=0A<br /><br />=0D=0ATogether th=\r\ne organizations identified a number of critical investments for taking the =\r\ncompany to the next level. At a time when competitors were hunkering down t=\r\no weather the storm, Wirtz Beverage built the framework to achieve long-ter=\r\nm success and deliver on their vision by:=0D=0A<br /><br />=0D=0A&bull;&nbs=\r\np;Expanding their national training platform from a single trainer in Illin=\r\nois to a national training platform with dedicated trainers, coherent modul=\r\nes, and enabling technology by August of 2011;<br />=0D=0A&bull;&nbsp;Imple=\r\nmenting a sophisticated enterprise resource planning system for completion =\r\nby July 1st,2012;<br />=0D=0A&bull;&nbsp;Investing millions of dollars in f=\r\nacilities improvements by July 1st,2012; and<br />=0D=0A&bull;&nbsp;Expandi=\r\nng their national trade marketing model by July 1st, 2012.<br /></div>=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A                        Today, Wirtz Beverage is recogni=\r\nzed by global suppliers for leading the industry, and is ahead of schedule =\r\nfor achieving its vision and objectives. As a unified team, Wirtz Beverage =\r\nwas able to outperform competitors, win such high-stakes accounts as Bacard=\r\ni, and was recently named =E2=80=9CWholesaler of the Year=E2=80=9D by Bever=\r\nage Industry magazine-the beverage industry=E2=80=99s most widely distribut=\r\ned publication.<br /><br />=0D=0AUnlike their competitors, Wirtz Beverage s=\r\ntuck to a winning strategy and made competitive investments to deliver on t=\r\nheir long-term vision without sacrificing near-term results. In so doing th=\r\ney have unseated the #1 national competitor in Illinois, forcing them into =\r\na reactive position.<br /><br />=0D=0APerhaps the result that speaks loudes=\r\nt of all is their growth during the past six years. Amidst global recession=\r\n, while competitors assumed a bunker-like mentality, Wirtz Beverage execute=\r\nd market-leading initiatives that resulted in a 55 percent increase in reve=\r\nnues. According to Wirtz Beverage Group VP of Sales and Marketing Danny Wir=\r\ntz, =E2=80=9CMcKinney Rogers inspired us to achieve the extraordinary and h=\r\nelped us develop and execute the processes to make that possible. They brin=\r\ng to bear the combination of a deep understanding of our business together =\r\nwith a best practices perspective from other industries. From HR, to lead i=\r\nntegration strategy, to operations, we worked together with the McKinney Ro=\r\ngers team to define vision, develop strategy, mitigate risk, and execute. T=\r\nhey helped us roll-out new programs and innovate processes, without ever mi=\r\nssing a beat in our day-to-day operations.=E2=80=9D<br /><br />=0D=0A      =\r\n                  <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w2\" oncl=\r\nick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Producing_the_S=\r\nolution_Tab/To_Producing_the_Solution_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 2</a> -->=0D=0A=\r\n                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c3\">=0D=0A                =\r\n    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab3\" class=3D\"w3\">Tab 3</a>=0D=0A<!--    =\r\n                <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w3\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker=\r\n._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Results_Tab/To_Results_Tab_displayed');\">Tab=\r\n 3</a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- tab =\r\n\"panes\" -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"panes\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>From December of =\r\n2007 until April of 2008 approximately 1,500 people were killed and 600,000=\r\n were displaced in Kenya following the disputed presidential elections.<br =\r\n/><br />Earlier in July of 2007 when the directors and managers of one of A=\r\nfrica=E2=80=99s leading businesses met to determine business strategy for t=\r\nhe next 12 months, nobody imagined that the country would be plunged into p=\r\nolitical instability and a violent revolt that would last several months. K=\r\nenya had always been considered a politically stable country, so on Decembe=\r\nr 27th the country was braced for a close Presidential election, but nothin=\r\ng more.<br /><br />During a 2007 meeting with McKinney Rogers the company h=\r\nad conducted Operational Rehearsal, a product designed by McKinney Rogers t=\r\no analyze factors impacting the market, competitive threats, likely develop=\r\nments, and see how they might affect the business.  Based on this analysis,=\r\n plans were put in place to protect the company=E2=80=99s position, or expl=\r\noit opportunities that might arise.</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div><strong>Operationa=\r\nl Rehearsal</strong> <br /><br />Operational Rehearsal consists of a sophis=\r\nticated exercise where members of the organization and senior members of Mc=\r\nKinney Rogers are assigned roles within three categories: the business stra=\r\ntegy group; the environment (government, demographic, and other external, i=\r\nmpacting forces); and the competition. Leveraging technology and experience=\r\n, the organization works through every possible scenario and outcome.<br />=\r\n<br />Participants are divided into three teams each representing the categ=\r\nories above, and sequestered at different locations. They are wired to a vi=\r\nrtual network where they input their actions in real-time, which are then j=\r\nudged by the software and business execution professional referees who, tog=\r\nether with opposing teams, respond with the resulting outcomes for the scen=\r\narios. Time is compressed so that one hour represents one month. The sessio=\r\nns are conducted in six-hour segments with a break after each hour to analy=\r\nze the outcome for the previous month.<br /><br />Operational Rehearsal ena=\r\nbles organizations to plan for a world of strategic shock.  At the same tim=\r\ne, it positions organizations to leverage unforeseen opportunities.  Operat=\r\nional Rehearsal is profoundly effective in preparing companies for all poss=\r\nible scenarios ensuring that a plan is in place for every contingency.<br /=\r\n><br />During this process, political turbulence spilling over into social =\r\nunrest was discussed as a =E2=80=9Cwild card=E2=80=9D scenario.  The more t=\r\nhis scenario was researched, the more the management and McKinney Rogers be=\r\ncame convinced it was a possibility. The client=E2=80=99s main production s=\r\nite is in a capital city, and every day trucks loaded with hundreds of case=\r\ns to distribute throughout the country. Any breakdown in law and order woul=\r\nd seriously disrupt distribution. McKinney Rogers and the participants of t=\r\nhe Operational Rehearsal looked at how they could continue to keep the busi=\r\nness moving and devised actions to ensure that consumers could get their pr=\r\noducts, if their worst fears of civil unrest became a reality.<br /><br /><=\r\nstrong>Neighborhood Outlets</strong><br /><br />Success revolved around add=\r\nressing one key question: although logistical planning can overcome the pro=\r\nblem of getting the product distributed to outlets, how do you sell the pro=\r\nduct if people are too scared to leave their homes?<br /><br />A contingenc=\r\ny plan was built around the premise that when people are afraid they stay c=\r\nlose to friends and neighbors: people they can trust. People may still want=\r\n to buy the company=E2=80=99s brand, but they do not want to leave their ne=\r\nighborhood to get it. This premise led to the concept of =E2=80=9Cneighborh=\r\nood outlets.=E2=80=9D Individuals in certain streets were approached to ope=\r\nn up their living rooms or front porches and sell the clients products in a=\r\n safe environment.<br /><br />A contingency committee made-up of the Direct=\r\nors of Supply Chain, Human Resources, Sales, Risk Management and Security, =\r\n=E2=80=9Crole-played=E2=80=9D the execution of the strategy to address any =\r\nunforeseen problems using McKinney Rogers=E2=80=99s Operational Rehearsal m=\r\nodel. This process identified the need for small distribution points to be =\r\nestablished to get brands into key positions from which it could be quickly=\r\n moved to these new =E2=80=9Coutlets.=E2=80=9D<br /><br />The situation was=\r\n monitored from December 26<sup>th</sup> to spot signals of the anticipated=\r\n unrest.  Once the Sales Director realized that the planned-for scenario wa=\r\ns imminent, he sent a simultaneous text message to everyone involved to ini=\r\ntiate the Neighborhood Outlet contingency plan.</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A=\r\n                        Usually in a crisis the initial reaction is shock, =\r\nwhich reduces an individual=E2=80=99s ability to perceive situations clearl=\r\ny and slows reaction time, but due to the plan developed during Operational=\r\n Rehearsal, the consumer products company was able to calmly initiate the =\r\n=E2=80=9CNeighborhood Outlet=E2=80=9D contingency plan, the moment the plan=\r\nned-for scenario seemed imminent.<br /><br />Ultimately, this company was t=\r\nhe least disrupted business in its category during the Kenyan presidential =\r\nelection and its aftermath. When speaking to present the half-year results =\r\nfor the period ending December 31, 2008, the Group MD said, =E2=80=9CDespit=\r\ne the difficult business environment that we faced across the region, I am =\r\npleased to announce that we grew our volumes by 8% and our net sales by 12%=\r\n.  Thanks to our partnership with McKinney Rogers we were able to manage th=\r\nis exceptional situation; I am convinced that our solid strategy, methodolo=\r\ngy and plans were our key assets to successfully overcoming the political s=\r\ntorm.=E2=80=9D This praise was reinforced by the Groups Finance Director wh=\r\no added, =E2=80=9CMcKinney Rogers was present before, during and after the =\r\ncrisis. They helped us to keep moving forward and stick to our strategy.=E2=\r\n=80=9D<br /><br />=0D=0A                        <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_=\r\nhlResults\" onclick=3D\"\" href=3D\"Documents/CaseStudyPDFS/MR%20Performs%20OR%=\r\n20To%20Keep%20Products%20and%20Profits%20Flowing.pdf\" target=3D\"_blank\">PDF=\r\n</a>=0D=0A                    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t=\r\n\t\t<div id=3D\"sidebar-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"sidebar\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<h3 =\r\nclass=3D\"sidebar-head\">=0D=0A                        CASE STUDIES=0D=0A    =\r\n                </h3>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<ul class=3D\"linklist1\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t    <li>=\r\n                       =0D=0A                            <a their potential to b=\r\necome entrepreneurs. <br />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t    <a id=3D\"ctl00_hlFootRead_More\" t=\r\nitle=3D\"Read More\" onclick=3D\"\" =\r\nid=3D\"ctl00_hlNAVCareers\" title=3D\"CAREERS\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTrack=\r\ner._trackPageview(&#39;/Global_Nav/Careers/To_Careers_page&#39;);\" href=3D\"=\r\nhttps://performancemanager.successfactors.eu/career?company=3DMcKinneyRoger=\r\n\">CAREERS</a></li>=0D=0A \t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"last\"><a id=3D\"ctl00_hlNavContac=\r\nt_Us\" title=3D\"CONTACT US\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview=\r\n(&#39;/Global_Nav/Contact_Us/To_Contact_Us_page&#39;);\" href=3D\"Contact_Us.=\r\naspx\">CONTACT US</a></li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t    <div id=3D\"contentwrapperMASTER\">=0D=0A\t            =0D=0A    <=\r\ndiv id=3D\"contentwrapper\" class=3D\"clearfix\">=0D=0A    \t<div id=3D\"hero-int=\r\nerior\">=0D=0A            <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageCaseStudiesHero\"=\r\n title=3D\"CASE STUDIES\" class=3D\"herolarge\" src=3D\"Images/hero/case-hero.jp=\r\ng\" alt=3D\"CASE STUDIES\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t<div id=3D\"con=\r\ntent\" class=3D\"contentinterior\">=0D=0A            <div id=3D\"precol\">=0D=0A=\r\n                McKinney Rogers=E2=80=99 Mission Leadership Enables Company=\r\n to Improve Performance and Profit Growth Despite Industry-wide Decline=0D=\r\n=0A            </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"leftcol\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<p>=0D=0A      =\r\n              The client ranks among the top African organizations and this=\r\n is widely regarded as one of the most respected companies in Africa.=0D=0A=\r\n\t    \t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<p>=0D=0A=\r\n                    =0D=0A    \t\t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"tab=\r\n-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t<!-- the tabs -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<ul class=3D\"tabs casetabs\">=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c1\">=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainConte=\r\nnt_hlTab1\" class=3D\"w1\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#=\r\n39;/Case_Studies/Customer_Challenge_Tab/To_Customer_Challenge_Tab_displayed=\r\n&#39;);\">Tab 1</a>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w1\" o=\r\nnclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Customer_Cha=\r\nllenge_Tab/To_Customer_Challenge_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 1</a> -->=0D=0A     =\r\n               </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c2\">=0D=0A                    <=\r\na id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab2\" class=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTr=\r\nacker._trackPageview(&#39;/Case_Studies/Producing_the_Solution_Tab/To_Produ=\r\ncing_the_Solution_Tab_displayed&#39;);\">Tab 2</a>=0D=0A<!--                =\r\n    <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPagev=\r\niew('/Case_Studies/Producing_the_Solution_Tab/To_Producing_the_Solution_Tab=\r\n_displayed');\">Tab 2</a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li c=\r\nlass=3D\"c3\">=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab3\" cl=\r\nass=3D\"w3\">Tab 3</a>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w3\"=\r\n onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Results_Ta=\r\nb/To_Results_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 3</a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- tab \"panes\" -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"panes\"=\r\n>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>The company experienced rapid growth during the six years =\r\nleading up to 2008, and more than doubled company revenues. The company has=\r\n maintained its growth trajectory by focusing on the profitable expansion o=\r\nf its services.<br /><br />During this prosperous time, some of the people =\r\nand systems in place were unable to keep pace with the expansion. This crea=\r\nted a shortfall in the capabilities needed to fully support the transformat=\r\nion.<br /><br />To address these issues, the CEO unveiled a new vision to t=\r\nransform the company, =E2=80=9CTo consistently be a Safe and Profitable Com=\r\npany that Guarantees World Class Service.=E2=80=9D  To make this a reality,=\r\n the company would have to consolidate the business, and develop a winning =\r\nleadership team with the ability to deliver the required =E2=80=98take-off=\r\n=E2=80=99 in performance. The company selected McKinney Rogers to help it p=\r\nut into place the performance, processes and behaviors across multiple key =\r\ndivisions: Finance, Information Systems, Commercial, Technical, Human Resou=\r\nrces & Administration, and Operations.</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>Applying their =\r\nMission Leadership approach &#8211; a business application of the military =\r\n=E2=80=9Cmission command=E2=80=9D strategy for highly effective execution d=\r\nespite changing environments &#8211; McKinney Rogers clarified the key task=\r\ns required for delivery of these goals, ensuring understanding and alignmen=\r\nt at all levels and across all divisions.<br /><br /><strong>Achieving High=\r\n Performance Teams</strong><br /><br />McKinney Rogers conducted High Perfo=\r\nrmance Team (HPT) workshops with 40 top senior executives. The objective wa=\r\ns to align the company=E2=80=99s culture, people, processes and performance=\r\n measurement while empowering individuals to be accountable for their speci=\r\nfic tactics and results.<br /><br />McKinney Rogers was able to take indivi=\r\nduals out of their comfort zone and dissect the communication and managemen=\r\nt process. Applying real life problem solving scenarios, role-playing chall=\r\nenges and other techniques, the workshops were designed to establish a new =\r\nHPT approach going forward for the teams. The workshops illuminated weaknes=\r\nses and opportunities for improvement in the existing approach. Company emp=\r\nloyees became committed to new performance goals, as they developed both te=\r\nam and individual action plans, which ensured that the culture and new ways=\r\n of working were all focused on becoming an HPT.<br /><br /><strong>Mission=\r\n Leadership Dashboard</strong><br /><br />A critical component of the McKin=\r\nney Rogers solution was the development and execution of a dashboard that a=\r\nllowed the company to track and measure progress toward its goals in real-t=\r\nime. The company=E2=80=99s Mission Dashboard consists of five uniquely focu=\r\nsed dashboards, which enable the company to monitor each individual activit=\r\ny, measure improvement and address obstacles proactively. By bringing this =\r\ntransparency to the process, and focusing everyone on the same metrics, the=\r\n dashboard fosters alignment and interdependencies across the organization =\r\nand improves accountability and confidence at all staffing levels. The insi=\r\nght gathered by the dashboard was then applied to deliver ongoing business =\r\nperformance coaching to the teams.</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A             =\r\n           Working with McKinney Rogers, the organization was able to trans=\r\nform behaviors, and unleash innovative thinking from its talent, while impr=\r\noving team performance through greater cross-functional collaboration. As a=\r\n result the company was able to increase the pace across the company and im=\r\nplement many of the organizational and infrastructural changes required to =\r\nenable a steep take-off in performance. Despite very challenging operating =\r\nconditions in the sector throughout 2009 and 2010, the client had increased=\r\n both its operating profit and net margin by more than 2% in the face of de=\r\ncline across the industry.<br /><br />=E2=80=9CFor our leadership teams the=\r\n Dashboard has become the primary means of reviewing our business performan=\r\nce,=E2=80=9D says the company=E2=80=99s, HR Director. =E2=80=9CIt is easy t=\r\no use and provides updated information. Using it has become part of everybo=\r\ndy=E2=80=99s normal business cycle. It is always up-to-date and entirely tr=\r\nansparent. As a consequence, it enables us all to =E2=80=98stick-to-it,=E2=\r\n=80=99 keeping the main goals and the contribution we make towards them fir=\r\nmly front-of-mind.=E2=80=9D<br /><br />=0D=0A src=3D\"Imag=\r\nes/common/mckinney-rogers-logo.png\" alt=3D\"McKinney Rogers\" border=3D\"0\" />=\r\n</a>=0D=0A\t\t\t    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"navwrapper\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<ul id=3D=\r\n\"nav\">=0D=0A  \t\t\t\t\t<li><a id=3D\"ctl00_hlNavHome\" title=3D\"HOME\" onclick=3D\"=\r\njavascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Global_Nav/Home/To_Home_page&#3=\r\n9;);\" href=3D\"Default.aspx\">HOME</a></li>=0D=0A \t\t\t\t\t<li><a id=3D\"ctl00_hlN=\r\navWho_We_Are\" title=3D\"WHO WE ARE\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._track=\r\nPageview(&#39;/Global_Nav/Who_We_Are/To_Who_We_Are_page&#39;);\" href=3D\"Who=\r\n_We_Are.aspx\">WHO WE ARE</a></li>=0D=0A \t\t\t\t\t<li><a id=3D\"ctl00_hlNavHow_We=\r\n_Think\" title=3D\"HOW WE THINK\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPage=\r\nview(&#39;/Global_Nav/How_We_Think/To_How_We_Think_page&#39;);\" href=3D\"How=\r\n_We_Think.aspx\">HOW WE THINK</a></li>=0D=0A \t\t\t\t\t<li><a id=3D\"ctl00_hlNavWh=\r\nat_We_Do\" title=3D\"WHAT WE DO\" id=3D\"ctl00_hlNAVCareers\" t=\r\nitle=3D\"CAREERS\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Glo=\r\nbal_Nav/Careers/To_Careers_page&#39;);\" US</a></li>=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t    <div id=3D\"con=\r\ntentwrapperMASTER\">=0D=0A\t            =0D=0A    <div id=3D\"contentwrapper\" =\r\nclass=3D\"clearfix\">=0D=0A    \t<div id=3D\"hero-interior\">=0D=0A            <=\r\nimg id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageCaseStudiesHero\" title=3D\"CASE STUDIES\" cl=\r\nass=3D\"herolarge\" src=3D\"Images/hero/case-hero.jpg\" alt=3D\"CASE STUDIES\" bo=\r\nrder=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t<div id=3D\"content\" class=3D\"contentinte=\r\nrior\">=0D=0A            <div id=3D\"precol\">=0D=0A                Manufactur=\r\ner of Iconic Global Brands Hires McKinney Rogers to Align Employees and Imp=\r\nrove Operations in the U.S.A. through High Performing Teams=0D=0A          =\r\n  </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"leftcol\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<p>=0D=0A                   =\r\n The United States division of this famous manufacturer of some of the worl=\r\nd=E2=80=99s leading brands, serves as the import, sales and marketing arm o=\r\nf this global organization.=0D=0A\t    \t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=\r\n=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<p>=0D=0A                    The company boasts a p=\r\nortfolio of some of the most recognized and top-selling brands in the Unite=\r\nd States.=0D=0A    \t\t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"tab-wrap\">=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t<!-- the tabs -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<ul class=3D\"tabs casetabs\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li=\r\n class=3D\"c1\">=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab1\" =\r\nclass=3D\"w1\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Case_St=\r\nudies/Customer_Challenge_Tab/To_Customer_Challenge_Tab_displayed&#39;);\">Ta=\r\nb 1</a>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w1\" onclick=3D\"j=\r\navascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Customer_Challenge_Tab/=\r\nTo_Customer_Challenge_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 1</a> -->=0D=0A                =\r\n    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c2\">=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl=\r\n00_MainContent_hlTab2\" class=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trac=\r\nkPageview(&#39;/Case_Studies/Producing_the_Solution_Tab/To_Producing_the_So=\r\nlution_Tab_displayed&#39;);\">Tab 2</a>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=\r\n=3D\"\" class=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_=\r\nStudies/Producing_the_Solution_Tab/To_Producing_the_Solution_Tab_displayed'=\r\n);\">Tab 2</a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c3\"=\r\n>=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab3\" class=3D\"w3\">=\r\nTab 3</a>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w3\" onclick=3D=\r\n\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Results_Tab/To_Result=\r\ns_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 3</a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<=\r\n/ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- tab \"panes\" -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"panes\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t=\r\n\t<div>For the organization, the United States is the most important market =\r\nin the world due to its sheer size and because U.S. market trends are adopt=\r\ned around the world. The company acquired various well-known premium brands=\r\n leading up to 2007 in order to build a product portfolio that could compet=\r\ne aggressively across the U.S. marketplace. The big challenge the company n=\r\now faced was how to align its hundreds of employees around all of the brand=\r\ns, under one functioning team, and lay the groundwork to maximize returns f=\r\nrom its impressive portfolio of brands.<br /><br />The U.S. company=E2=80=\r\n=99s newly appointed CEO in North America, recognized the need to alter the=\r\n way people worked and to break down operational silos that had built-up wi=\r\nthin the company as a result of organic growth and acquisitions. The CEO fe=\r\nlt that a particular problem was business units not sharing best practice a=\r\ncross different brands, functions and geographies. He asserted, =E2=80=9CEm=\r\nployees were thinking as individuals rather than as a team. Changing this w=\r\nould unleash the talented people in our business to make much better use of=\r\n their colleagues, something that by itself would dramatically improve effe=\r\nctiveness.=E2=80=9D</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>Having worked with business execut=\r\nion professionals McKinney Rogers at a previous company the CEO was convinc=\r\ned that their expertise at delivering alignment solutions and their unique =\r\nresults-driven approach would drive the company to achieve its U.S. growth =\r\ntargets.<br /><br /><strong>HPT Workshops</strong><br /><br />McKinney Roge=\r\nrs tackled the challenge through a series of High Performance Team (HPT) wo=\r\nrkshops conducted semi-weekly over a six month period, for 450 U.S. employe=\r\nes. The objective was to align the company=E2=80=99s culture, people, proce=\r\nsses and performance measurement.<br /><br />At the heart of the HPT worksh=\r\nops is ASPIRE=C2=AE. An acronym for Aim, Situation, Plan, Inspire Reinforce=\r\n, and Evaluate. ASPIRE=C2=AE is an HPT model for establishing clarity and a=\r\nlignment while identifying and replacing negative behaviors with more effec=\r\ntive ways of operating. By pairing people from different divisions and leve=\r\nls within the company, McKinney Rogers was able to take individuals out of =\r\ntheir comfort zone and dissect the communication and management process. Ap=\r\nplying real life problem solving scenarios, role-playing challenges and oth=\r\ner techniques, the workshops were designed to establish a new HPT approach =\r\ngoing forward for the teams.<br /><br />The workshops illuminated weaknesse=\r\ns and opportunities for improvement in the existing approach, and exposed s=\r\nenior management and more junior employees to one another=E2=80=99s challen=\r\nges, limitations and perspectives. The workshops ensured that company emplo=\r\nyees were committed to new performance goals, as they developed both team a=\r\nnd individual action plans, which ensured that the culture and new ways of =\r\nworking were all focused on becoming an HPT.<br /><br />The CEO expressed, =\r\n=E2=80=9CThe coaching approach to improving performance has been a great su=\r\nccess. Employees are living the company=E2=80=99s values, all working in th=\r\ne same direction, and they are determined and passionate about achieving th=\r\ne company=E2=80=99s goals.=E2=80=9D</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A            =\r\n            The company achieved 13 percent earnings from operating growth =\r\nleading up to the recession, which placed it on the needed trajectory to ac=\r\nhieve its long-term goals. The company has undergone a culture shift that c=\r\nan be directly attributed to McKinney Rogers=E2=80=99 HPT philosophy, which=\r\n focuses on changing people=E2=80=99s perspectives as to what it takes to =\r\n=E2=80=9Cexceed expectations at every opportunity.=E2=80=9D According to th=\r\ne U.S. Company=E2=80=99s CEO, =E2=80=9CMcKinney Rogers unleashes the power =\r\nof individuals to become a high performing team. They realize the leadershi=\r\np power in people by helping the company get to the vision of where it want=\r\ns to be. Unlike consultancies that come in, run their program and leave, Mc=\r\nKinney Rogers stays with you, makes sure you are managing the program and i=\r\ns interested in the success of the company.=E2=80=9D<br /><br />The Global =\r\nCEO added, =E2=80=9CMcKinney Rogers was the catalyst that unleashed a signi=\r\nficant change which has led to greatly improved business performance in a v=\r\nital market. The changes to employee behavior and company structure that re=\r\nsulted from the HPT workshops remain solidly embedded and the new ways of w=\r\norking still apply today. This success in the U.S. market is the first chap=\r\nter in what I hope will be a global story.=E2=80=9D Based upon the U.S. Com=\r\npany=E2=80=99s success, the Global CEO and his global team are now also usi=\r\nng McKinney Roger=E2=80=99s HPT offering to align the vision and embed the =\r\nvalues across a 6,500 strong workforce with the effect of creating alignmen=\r\nt and in turn accelerating the attainment of one unified goal.<br /><br />=\r\n=0D=0A                        <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlResults\" onclick=\r\n=3D\"\"
