US</a></li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t    </div>=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t    <div id=3D\"contentwrapperMASTER\">=0D=0A\t        =\r\n    =0D=0A    <div id=3D\"contentwrapper\" class=3D\"clearfix\">=0D=0A    \t<div=\r\n id=3D\"hero-interior\">=0D=0A            <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageC=\r\naseStudiesHero\" title=3D\"CASE STUDIES\" class=3D\"herolarge\" src=3D\"Images/he=\r\nro/case-hero.jpg\" alt=3D\"CASE STUDIES\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t=\r\n\t<div id=3D\"content\" class=3D\"contentinterior\">=0D=0A            <div id=3D=\r\n\"precol\">=0D=0A                ITV Partners with McKinney Rogers=C2=A9 to D=\r\nrive Technology Transformation=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"l=\r\neftcol\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<p>=0D=0A                    ITV is the largest commercia=\r\nl television network in the UK. It is the home of popular television from t=\r\nhe biggest entertainment events, to original drama, major sport, landmark f=\r\nactual series and independent news. It operates a family of channels includ=\r\ning ITV1, ITV2, ITV3 and ITV4 and CITV which are broadcast free-to-air on a=\r\nnalogue (ITV1 only), Freeview, digital satellite (Sky/ Freesat) and cable.=\r\n=0D=0A\t    \t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<p>=\r\n=0D=0A                    ITV is also focused on delivering its programming=\r\n across multiple platforms including itv.com, video on demand on cable tele=\r\nvision and other =E2=80=98closed=E2=80=99 platforms, mobile devices and gam=\r\nes consoles. ITV Studios produces and sells programmes and formats in the U=\r\nK and worldwide, and comprises of ITV=E2=80=99s UK and international produc=\r\ntion operations, international distribution, home entertainment, publishing=\r\n, merchandising and licensing.=0D=0A    \t\t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div=\r\n id=3D\"tab-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t<!-- the tabs -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<ul class=3D\"tabs case=\r\ntabs\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c1\">=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_=\r\nMainContent_hlTab1\" class=3D\"w1\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPa=\r\ngeview(&#39;/Case_Studies/Customer_Challenge_Tab/To_Customer_Challenge_Tab_=\r\ndisplayed&#39;);\">Tab 1</a>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" class=\r\n=3D\"w1\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Cus=\r\ntomer_Challenge_Tab/To_Customer_Challenge_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 1</a> -->=\r\n=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c2\">=0D=0A          =\r\n          <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab2\" class=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javasc=\r\nript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Case_Studies/Producing_the_Solution_T=\r\nab/To_Producing_the_Solution_Tab_displayed&#39;);\">Tab 2</a>=0D=0A<!--     =\r\n               <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker.=\r\n_trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Producing_the_Solution_Tab/To_Producing_the_S=\r\nolution_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 2</a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c3\">=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainConte=\r\nnt_hlTab3\" class=3D\"w3\">Tab 3</a>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\"=\r\n class=3D\"w3\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studi=\r\nes/Results_Tab/To_Results_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 3</a> -->=0D=0A            =\r\n        </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- tab \"panes\" -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div cl=\r\nass=3D\"panes\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div><img style=3D\"float:left;margin-right:24px;ma=\r\nrgin-bottom:8px;\" src=3D\"/Documents/CaseStudyPDFS/ITVLogo.png\" />    =0D=0A=\r\n    The Television industry has changed rapidly over the last 10 years. Eme=\r\nrging media companies competing for advertising revenue have adopted cuttin=\r\ng edge digital technologies in order to grow in a market place which has be=\r\nen revolutionised by developments in broadband internet, high-speed mobile =\r\nnetworks and smart phones. ITV=E2=80=99s extensive analogue infrastructure =\r\nstruggled to accommodate and effectively exploit this digital revolution an=\r\nd piece-meal investment was being undermined by handling and transmission p=\r\nrocesses. =0D=0A    <br /><br />=0D=0A    ITV recognised that delivering di=\r\ngitised, high quality content to a global audience was the future and in or=\r\nder to address ITV=E2=80=99s lagging technology position in the market, CEO=\r\n Adam Crozier recruited Paul Dale to create and fulfill the position of CTO=\r\n. Paul Dale is an industry veteran who had a well-deserved reputation for t=\r\nurning broadcasters around. In a previous role, Paul had worked with Astro =\r\nin Malaysia, where he transformed a company lacking in strategy and innovat=\r\nion by delivering the technology that was needed to reposition the company =\r\nand take advantage of the opportunities that were emerging from the digital=\r\n broadcast revolution. Paul was recruited to perform a similar transformati=\r\non for ITV, a far larger corporation. He immediately realized that in order=\r\n to achieve this ambitious goal, he needed a partner who could help align h=\r\nundreds of people to his strategy and empower them to execute and deliver o=\r\nn his vision.=0D=0A  </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A      Paul Dale recognized=\r\n what ITV Technology required in order to support the delivery of the 2015 =\r\nITV vision of a =E2=80=9Clean ITV that can create world class content, exec=\r\nuted across multiple platforms and sold around the world=E2=80=9D. One of h=\r\nis biggest challenges was to build a team with the right commitment, behavi=\r\nours and leadership skills to inspire his Division, driving change whilst e=\r\nnsuring the gap between his strategy and its execution was minimized. Havin=\r\ng previously worked with business execution professionals from McKinney Rog=\r\ners, Paul knew that their expertise at delivering alignment solutions and t=\r\nheir unique results-oriented approach would drive the company to achieve hi=\r\ns technology vision.=0D=0A      <br /><br />=0D=0A      <strong>Setting the=\r\n Strategy - MR Mission Planning=E2=84=A2</strong>=0D=0A      <br />=0D=0A  =\r\n    The first step was to ensure the senior executives were aligned and inv=\r\nested in the approach. McKinney Rogers conducted a two-day Mission Planning=\r\n session with Paul=E2=80=99s top 40 executives. This consisted of leading t=\r\nhe group through a strategic exercise that enabled them to critically exami=\r\nne their ideas for future growth. This accounted for the constraints and op=\r\nportunities that the current operating environment presented. This generate=\r\nd informed decisions about where and how to invest for growth, whilst clear=\r\nly defining every individuals=E2=80=99 role in the process.=0D=0A      <br =\r\n/><br />=0D=0A      The outcome of their analysis was a four-year strategy =\r\nto transform ITV=E2=80=99s technology with the aim of positioning the broad=\r\ncaster as a market leader, therefore achieving Technology=E2=80=99s contrib=\r\nution to the ITV vision. The strategy was visualized in an octagonal diagra=\r\nm called The Arena, which communicates the relationship between every compo=\r\nnent of the strategy.=0D=0A      <br /><br />=0D=0A      Having constructed=\r\n and articulated the strategy, Paul and McKinney Rogers went on a series of=\r\n road shows to London, Leeds and Newcastle to personally involve and commun=\r\nicate with the members of Paul=E2=80=99s direct team; ensuring that each pe=\r\nrson had a clear understanding of their role in the journey ahead.=0D=0A   =\r\n   <br /><br />      =0D=0A      <strong>Creating Dynamic Alignment - MR Mi=\r\nssion Alignment=E2=84=A2 </strong>=0D=0A      <br />=0D=0A      Having secu=\r\nred intellectual and emotional buy-in, McKinney Rogers worked with all dire=\r\nctors and controllers to ensure absolute clarity in their roles - and their=\r\n ability to engage and fully align the teams. This ensured that all parties=\r\n were clear about the importance of what needed to be completed throughout =\r\nthe year, and what foundation activities would have to be started immediate=\r\nly, in order to generate results. =0D=0A      <br /><br />      =0D=0A     =\r\n <strong>Empowering Through Transparency - Mission Leadership Dashboard=E2=\r\n=84=A2</strong>=0D=0A      <br />=0D=0A      Once the first step in deliver=\r\ning the strategy had been discussed in detail, the in-year plan was loaded =\r\ninto a performance tracking and task alignment dashboard that enabled effec=\r\ntive execution. The Dashboard is a critical component of the McKinney Roger=\r\ns solution, and encourages a forward looking, proactive approach to monitor=\r\n performance and respond to challenges. It replaces a reflective and reacti=\r\nve approach to performance measurement, responding to reports of events in =\r\nthe past. It also brings transparency to the process and focuses everyone o=\r\nn the same metrics and fosters alignment and interdependencies across the o=\r\nrganization to improve accountability and confidence at all levels. The ins=\r\night gathered by the dashboard is regularly updated based on progress and n=\r\new direction. =0D=0A      <br /><br />=0D=0A       <strong>Unlocking Potent=\r\nial - High Performance Teams </strong>=0D=0A      <br />=0D=0A      To ensu=\r\nre personal commitment and reinforce alignment of the new strategy, McKinne=\r\ny Rogers conducted workshops for 2.5 days with the top 40 executives follow=\r\ned by one-day workshops for the top 100 members of the team to recognise an=\r\nd embed the team behaviours needed to deliver success. Workshops were based=\r\n on the McKinney Rogers High Performance Team (HPT) approach which fundamen=\r\ntally changed behaviours through an experiential process that galvanized th=\r\ne members and equipped them with a road map for working together as a HPT.=\r\n=0D=0A      <br /><br />      =0D=0A      <strong>Where are we now?</strong=\r\n>=0D=0A      <br />=0D=0A      In anticipation of the coming year, Paul Dal=\r\ne and McKinney Rogers have conducted 2 day sessions with the top 14 executi=\r\nves to review progress, uncover opportunities for improvement and present t=\r\nhe mission for next year. During these sessions everyone has a chance to ch=\r\nallenge the plan to gain a deeper understanding of their role in supporting=\r\n the delivery of the mission. This in turn, is cascaded down to their teams=\r\n by each of the 14 participants with the assistance of McKinney Rogers.=0D=\r\n=0A    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A                        =0D=0A      As a=\r\n result of the strategy development and alignment accomplished by Paul, tog=\r\nether with his McKinney Rogers team, ITV=E2=80=99s renamed Technology, Plat=\r\nforms and Business Delivery Division has emerged from a =E2=80=98back-offic=\r\ne=E2=80=99 supporting role, and now sits at the core of ITV=E2=80=99s futur=\r\ne strategy. It is beginning to provide the agile and extensible infrastruct=\r\nure and support required to deliver high quality digital content to a globa=\r\nl audience across multiple media platforms. It has the full support of the =\r\ncompany and has received the requisite funding to fully execute their plan =\r\nover the next four years.=0D=0A       <br /><br />=0D=0A    =E2=80=9CWhat h=\r\nas impressed me most about McKinney Rogers is their ability to align an ent=\r\nire organization in support of a long-term vision. They empower execution b=\r\ny giving every employee clarity about the company aims and the process of a=\r\nchieving these, whilst instilling confidence in their leadership and the ac=\r\nhievability of the mission,=E2=80=9D Paul Dale explained. =E2=80=9CAt the e=\r\nnd of the day you have a team of people who understand their role and are e=\r\nxcited about what they are going to accomplish=E2=80=9D he concluded.=0D=0A=\r\n    <br /><br />=0D=0A      =0D=0A                        <a id=3D\"ctl00_Ma=\r\ninContent_hlResults\" onclick=3D\"\" onclick=3D\"ja=\r\nvascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Footer_Nav/Purpose/To_Purpose_pag=\r\ne&#39;);\" href=3D\"Who_We_Are.aspx?ID=3DP#c1\">OUR PURPOSE</a></li>=0D=0A    =\r\n                            <li><a id=3D\"ctl00_hlFootPHILOSOPHY\" title=3D\"O=\r\nUR PHILOSOPHY\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Foote=\r\nr_Nav/Philosophy/To_Philosophy_page&#39;);\" </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- t=\r\nab \"panes\" -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"panes\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>Early in the c=\r\nompany=E2=80=99s history, managers were culled from those who started at th=\r\ne register or other entry-level positions.  With little formal training and=\r\n a reliance on an apprenticeship model, they slowly moved their way up the =\r\ncorporate ladder. This informal system rewarded tenure over talent and ofte=\r\nn overlooked junior managers with strong potential.<br /><br />=0D=0A=0D=0A=\r\nHowever, with nearly 9,000 retail units today, the demand to open new store=\r\ns has outpaced the old system=E2=80=99s ability to produce qualified manage=\r\nrs. According to the President and CEO, =E2=80=9CIt takes two years to buil=\r\nd a store, but up to seven years to create a store manager.=E2=80=9D Recogn=\r\nizing the need for talent to fuel growth and the huge untapped potential of=\r\n his employees, the CEO committed to finding a way to identify talent faste=\r\nr, compress the time it takes to train them, and produce higher quality lea=\r\nders. <br /><br /></div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>The company enlisted the help of bu=\r\nsiness execution experts McKinney Rogers to design and direct a comprehensi=\r\nve leader development system that identified high-potential employees and t=\r\nransformed them into exceptional managers. In the process, the two organiza=\r\ntions created a unique, groundbreaking leader development system that gener=\r\nated unprecedented career opportunities for the company=E2=80=99s rising ta=\r\nlent while cultivating world-class managers for the business.=0D=0A<br /><b=\r\nr />=0D=0A=0D=0ALeveraging the <strong>Mission Leadership philosophy</stron=\r\ng>, McKinney Rogers created a customized leadership development system for =\r\nthe company, known as Integrated Business Leadership (IBL). By synthesizing=\r\n development, training and educational activities in the context of the com=\r\npany=E2=80=99s day-to-day operational needs, IBL was far more relevant and =\r\nimpactful than generic management training.=0D=0A<br /><br />=0D=0A=0D=0ATh=\r\ne program takes each participant through a number of developmental, trainin=\r\ng and inspirational experiences that cause them to think of themselves as l=\r\neaders. It includes master classes, on-the-job experience, cross-functional=\r\n collaboration, expert guest speakers, self-paced study, student-led activi=\r\nties, experiential exercises, service projects, blended learning and small =\r\ngroup discussions.  The outcome is a network of graduates who identify them=\r\nselves as leaders, rally high performing teams, and continue to develop whi=\r\nle leading in a rapidly changing environment.=0D=0A<br /><br /></div>=0D=0A=\r\n\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A                        In its third year, IBL has transfor=\r\nmed the company=E2=80=99s top talent training program into a cross-function=\r\nal, multi-dimensional talent development system. In addition to store manag=\r\ners, the system has expanded to develop market leaders, senior merchants, a=\r\nnd executives. It=E2=80=99s producing both the quantity and quality of lead=\r\ners needed to sustain and drive growth. =0D=0A<br /><br />=0D=0A=0D=0ANot o=\r\nnly have 74% of graduates been promoted one, two or three levels up within =\r\njust 18 months of graduation, but they=E2=80=99re outperforming their peers=\r\n and producing real business results. Stores and markets led by IBL graduat=\r\nes have posted higher sales growth numbers than the rest of the company eve=\r\nry quarter since entering their position [typical store revenue is around $=\r\n100 million and markets bring in up to $1 billion]. In the last 6 months al=\r\none, while the company has posted an average loss of -1.3% in sales, IBL gr=\r\nads have produced a +2.1% gain in sales for their stores and markets.=0D=0A=\r\n<br /><br />=0D=0A=0D=0AIBL has emerged as more than just a program for adv=\r\nancement. It has achieved the holy grail of development programs: true beha=\r\nvioral change. Graduates have testified to their personal and professional =\r\ntransformation=E2=80=94some with words, but all with enhanced performance. =\r\nToday, entry-level employees aspire to be selected to the program while gra=\r\nduates aspire to return to teach.  =0D=0A<br /><br />=0D=0A=0D=0AIBL=E2=80=\r\n=99s unified solution to leader development is truly unique.  Businesses ar=\r\nound the globe are starting to recognize it as the best solution to rapidly=\r\n flood their organization with quality leaders at every level.=0D=0A<br /><=\r\nbr />=0D=0A                        <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlResults\" on=\r\nclick=3D\"\" href=3D\"Documents/CaseStudyPDFS/Worldwide%20Organization%20Partn=\r\ners%20with%20McKinney.pdf\" target=3D\"_blank\">PDF</a>=0D=0A                 =\r\n   </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"sidebar-wrap\">=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div their potential to become entrep=\r\nreneurs. <br />=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t    <a id=3D\"ctl00_hlFootRead_More\" title=3D\"Read=\r\n More\" onclick=3D\"\" largest =\r\nnetwork in America, hired McKinney Rogers to build a sustainable competitiv=\r\ne advantage for their business.  In addition to the U.S. subscriber base, t=\r\nhe client also broadcasts in at least 151 countries worldwide.=0D=0A    =0D=\r\n=0A\t    \t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<p>=0D=\r\n=0A                          =0D=0A      The client=E2=80=99s programming c=\r\nonsists primarily of theatrically released motion pictures and original ser=\r\nies, along with made-for-cable movies and documentaries, boxing matches, an=\r\nd notable stand-up comedy and concert specials.=0D=0A    =0D=0A    \t\t\t</p>=\r\n=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"tab-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t<!-- the tabs -->=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t<ul class=3D\"tabs casetabs\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c1\">=0D=0A      =\r\n              <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab1\" class=3D\"w1\" onclick=3D\"ja=\r\nvascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Case_Studies/Customer_Challenge_T=\r\nab/To_Customer_Challenge_Tab_displayed&#39;);\">Tab 1</a>=0D=0A<!--         =\r\n           <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w1\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._tra=\r\nckPageview('/Case_Studies/Customer_Challenge_Tab/To_Customer_Challenge_Tab_=\r\ndisplayed');\">Tab 1</a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li cl=\r\nass=3D\"c2\">=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab2\" cla=\r\nss=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Case_Studi=\r\nes/Producing_the_Solution_Tab/To_Producing_the_Solution_Tab_displayed&#39;)=\r\n;\">Tab 2</a>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w2\" onclick=\r\n=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Producing_the_Solu=\r\ntion_Tab/To_Producing_the_Solution_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 2</a> -->=0D=0A   =\r\n                 </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c3\">=0D=0A                   =\r\n <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab3\" class=3D\"w3\">Tab 3</a>=0D=0A<!--       =\r\n             <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w3\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._t=\r\nrackPageview('/Case_Studies/Results_Tab/To_Results_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 3<=\r\n/a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- tab \"pa=\r\nnes\" -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"panes\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A    The presid=\r\nent of one of their business units wanted to accelerate the development and=\r\n focus of an already high performing team that was meeting, and often excee=\r\nding, expectations.  The leadership was familiar with the business executio=\r\nn professionals at McKinney Rogers, through work previously done with their=\r\n marketing team, and realized that they were uniquely qualified to elevate =\r\nthe performance of this team from great to exceptional, in a sustainable wa=\r\ny.=0D=0A  </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A      The approach was to embed a way=\r\n of working that would sustain and intensify the high performance of the cl=\r\nient=E2=80=99s teams.  McKinney Rogers conducted a series of High Performan=\r\nce Team (HPT) workshops for the executive team and the broader department; =\r\na total of 62 people.  The objective was to align the company=E2=80=99s cul=\r\nture, people, processes and performance measurement.  The team was able to =\r\nfocus on what had caused them to be so successful, highlight areas where th=\r\nere had been challenges, and develop a methodology that would allow them to=\r\n focus on their own HPT behaviors to drive continued success.=0D=0A      <b=\r\nr /><br /> =0D=0A      At the heart of the HPT workshops is ASPIRE=C2=AE.  =\r\nAn acronym for <strong>A</strong>im, <strong>S</strong>ituation, <strong>P<=\r\n/strong>lan, <strong>I</strong>nspiration, <strong>R</strong>einforcement, =\r\n<strong>E</strong>valuation. ASPIRE is a McKinney Rogers empowerment tool f=\r\nor establishing clarity and alignment while identifying and replacing negat=\r\nive behaviors with more effective ways of operating.  McKinney Rogers was a=\r\nble to take individuals out of their comfort zone and dissect the communica=\r\ntion and management process that effected their everyday work environment. =\r\n Applying various problem solving scenarios, role playing challenges and ot=\r\nher techniques, the highly engaging workshop established a new HPT approach=\r\n going forward for the team.=0D=0A      <br /><br /> =0D=0A      Since the =\r\ninitial workshops, McKinney Rogers has conducted follow-up sessions to main=\r\ntain open lines of communications, cultivate reflection and feedback on the=\r\nir progress, and revisit the high pressure simulation that continues to rei=\r\nnforce HPT within their culture.=0D=0A    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>=0D=0A     =\r\n                   =0D=0A     The workshops have ensured that the team is c=\r\nommitted to new performance goals focused on embodying a sustained HPT cult=\r\nure.  =0D=0A     The McKinney Rogers team provided skills to communicate be=\r\ntter, to hold more effective meetings, and provide feedback in a more profe=\r\nssional setting across the organizational lines.  =0D=0A     They have crea=\r\nted processes for information flow that elevated situational awareness thro=\r\nughout the team but also puts information in the hands of the right people =\r\nto make expedited decisions.  =0D=0A     Team spirit and passion has increa=\r\nsed leading to higher job satisfaction.  =0D=0A     One of the department m=\r\nembers said, =E2=80=9COur objective was clear; left no room for judgments o=\r\nnly productivity! The breakout sessions were a good opportunity to further =\r\ncollaborate and communicate ideas moving forward! I felt positive energy fl=\r\nowing throughout the room and a newfound enthusiasm to accomplish our tasks=\r\n!=E2=80=9D=0D=0A     <br /><br />=0D=0A      =0D=0A                        =\r\n<a target=3D\"_blank\">PDF</a>=0D=0A                    </d=\r\niv>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"sidebar-wrap\">=0D=0A=\r\n\t\t\t\t<div US</a></li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=0A\t\t\t    </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t    <div id=3D\"contentwrapperMASTER\">=0D=0A\t            =0D=0A    <div=\r\n id=3D\"contentwrapper\" class=3D\"clearfix\">=0D=0A    \t<div id=3D\"hero-interi=\r\nor\">=0D=0A            <img id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_imageCaseStudiesHero\" ti=\r\ntle=3D\"CASE STUDIES\" class=3D\"herolarge\" src=3D\"Images/hero/case-hero.jpg\" =\r\nalt=3D\"CASE STUDIES\" border=3D\"0\" />=0D=0A\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t<div id=3D\"conten=\r\nt\" class=3D\"contentinterior\">=0D=0A            <div id=3D\"precol\">=0D=0A   =\r\n             McKinney Rogers Drives a New Global Strategy Across a Matrixed=\r\n Multinational=0D=0A            </div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"leftcol\">=0D=0A\t\t=\r\n\t\t<p>=0D=0A                    This McKinney Rogers client is one of the mo=\r\nst successful consumer product goods brands in the world. Since the late 19=\r\n90s the brand has been owned by a well-known leading global consumer goods =\r\ncompany.=0D=0A\t    \t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"rightcol\">=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t<p>=0D=0A                    Sold in 150 different markets worldwide=\r\n, 50% of its sales derive from Europe where growth had slowed significantly=\r\n.=0D=0A    \t\t\t</p>=0D=0A\t\t\t</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t<div id=3D\"tab-wrap\">=0D=0A\t\t\t<!-=\r\n- the tabs -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<ul class=3D\"tabs casetabs\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D=\r\n\"c1\">=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab1\" class=3D\"=\r\nw1\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview(&#39;/Case_Studies/Cus=\r\ntomer_Challenge_Tab/To_Customer_Challenge_Tab_displayed&#39;);\">Tab 1</a>=\r\n=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w1\" onclick=3D\"javascri=\r\npt:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Customer_Challenge_Tab/To_Cust=\r\nomer_Challenge_Tab_displayed');\">Tab 1</a> -->=0D=0A                    </l=\r\ni>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c2\">=0D=0A                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_Main=\r\nContent_hlTab2\" class=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPagevi=\r\new(&#39;/Case_Studies/Producing_the_Solution_Tab/To_Producing_the_Solution_=\r\nTab_displayed&#39;);\">Tab 2</a>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" c=\r\nlass=3D\"w2\" onclick=3D\"javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies=\r\n/Producing_the_Solution_Tab/To_Producing_the_Solution_Tab_displayed');\">Tab=\r\n 2</a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<li class=3D\"c3\">=0D=0A=\r\n                    <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlTab3\" class=3D\"w3\">Tab 3</=\r\na>=0D=0A<!--                    <a href=3D\"\" class=3D\"w3\" onclick=3D\"javasc=\r\nript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/Case_Studies/Results_Tab/To_Results_Tab_d=\r\nisplayed');\">Tab 3</a> -->=0D=0A                    </li>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0D=\r\n=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- tab \"panes\" -->=0D=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"panes\">=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>B=\r\nefore the brand=E2=80=99s change of ownership it had belonged to a decentra=\r\nlized organization with a highly fragmented marketing strategy. Despite thi=\r\ns it had performed well due to its prioritized position within the company=\r\n=E2=80=99s portfolio.<br /><br />This was not the case within its new home,=\r\n a highly matrixed organization with a much larger portfolio and limited kn=\r\nowledge of the brand=E2=80=99s market. Consequently the products priority l=\r\nowered and the brand risked becoming even more disjointed within this setti=\r\nng.<br /><br />With the slowing pace of expansion in the brands key markets=\r\n it became especially important to establish a consistent global brand plat=\r\nform and accelerate growth internationally.<br /><br />To survive, therefor=\r\ne, it would have to create a completely new global growth strategy in a hig=\r\nhly matrixed organization. The newly appointed president of the brand=E2=80=\r\n=99s Global Marketing had to align the organization and compel the differen=\r\nt regions in the matrix to support a global growth strategy, a significant =\r\nchallenge as many of the regional decision makers did not view the brand as=\r\n a priority.</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>The brand enlisted the help of business e=\r\nxecution professionals McKinney Rogers to help navigate the matrix structur=\r\ne and leverage the resources of the consumer goods company to help drive a =\r\nnew global brand strategy.<br /><br /><strong>Creating a Global Leadership =\r\nTeam &#8211; the Global Leadership Team</strong><br /><br />The first step =\r\nwas to form the brands Global Leadership Team (GLT). Headed by the presiden=\r\nt of the brand=E2=80=99s Global Marketing, the GLT was also comprised of th=\r\ne global organizations key regional decision makers; a mix of general manag=\r\ners and regional marketing presidents. The aim of the board was to =E2=80=\r\n=9Cbring the matrix into the decision making tent.=E2=80=9D But to get thes=\r\ne disparate parties to align against a common goal as one team, the GLT wou=\r\nld need to enlist McKinney Rogers=E2=80=99 Mission Leadership approach; a b=\r\nusiness application of the military =E2=80=9Cmission command=E2=80=9D strat=\r\negy for highly effective execution despite changing environments.<br /><br =\r\n/><strong>Mission Planning</strong><br /><br />To assist the Board in evalu=\r\nating the brand=E2=80=99s position in the global market and plan accordingl=\r\ny, McKinney Rogers conducted a Mission Planning session. This consisted of =\r\nleading the team through a strategic exercise that enabled them to critical=\r\nly examine the global opportunities and barriers facing the brand, filter i=\r\ndeas and make highly informed decisions about where and how to invest for g=\r\nrowth. The outcome of their analysis was a new aligned global vision for th=\r\ne brand and a concise market classification that placed Africa at the heart=\r\n of the brand=E2=80=99s growth plans and identified the critical need to re=\r\nestablish growth in North America and the Far East.<br /><br /><strong>Miss=\r\nion Analysis</strong><br /><br />By applying Mission Analysis, McKinney Rog=\r\ners helped the GLT to identify the key pillars of the strategy that would b=\r\ne critical to accelerating growth. Improving the consistency and power of t=\r\nhe marketing message was identified as a top priority. Leveraging the GLT, =\r\nthe decision was made to consolidate advertising agencies to drive a single=\r\n, consistent message across the globe based on the new global positioning.<=\r\nbr /><br />Because the decision was made collectively by the GLT, there wer=\r\ne limited obstacles to its execution. Armed with consistent messaging and a=\r\n clearly defined list of target markets, the brand was able to move forward=\r\n with its international expansion, while receiving the full support of appo=\r\ninted GLT members in all of the global organizations targeted regions. Furt=\r\nher underscoring regional collaboration and accountability, each member of =\r\nthe GLT was assigned a specific global growth initiative to champion based =\r\non their interests, skill set, =E2=80=9Cskin in the game=E2=80=9D and passi=\r\nons.<br /><br /><strong>High Performance Teams</strong><br /><br />To ensur=\r\ne the alignment of this revised strategy, McKinney Rogers conducted a Globa=\r\nl Brand Summit, pulling together a team of 130 of the brand=E2=80=99s marke=\r\nters from across the globe. At the heart of this summit was the McKinney Ro=\r\ngers High Performance Team (HPT) methodology that fundamentally changed the=\r\n behaviors in the organization from a market-soloed environment to a unifie=\r\nd extended global brand team, shared best practices and challenged assumpti=\r\nons. The experiential process galvanized the members into one team with a c=\r\nommon way of working and a road map to become an HPT.</div>=0D=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div>=\r\n=0D=0A                        In less than 24 months, growth had been accel=\r\nerated in Africa and reestablished in North America and Asia, simultaneousl=\r\ny supporting long-term growth to the brand.<br /><br />=E2=80=9CThe applica=\r\ntion of Mission Leadership was critical to [the brand=E2=80=99s] success ov=\r\ner this period of time. The internal complexity of the newly formed busines=\r\ns, combined with sluggish global growth rates, called into question the org=\r\nanization=E2=80=99s ability to grow this brand,=E2=80=9D explained the bran=\r\nd=E2=80=99s President of Global Marketing. He further added =E2=80=9CBy ali=\r\ngning and inspiring the GLT and wider community to fully commit to a new st=\r\nrategy and global vision for the brand, we were able to cut through the mat=\r\nrix and return [the brand] to stronger growth.=E2=80=9D<br /><br />=0D=0A  =\r\n                      <a id=3D\"ctl00_MainContent_hlResults\" onclick=3D\"\"
